15253444Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate string previousText = string.Empty;Di2015NewLineprivate bool processing = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate void textBox1_TextChanged(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // If we're already messing around with the text, don't start again.Di2015NewLine    if (processing)Di2015NewLine        return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    processing = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The current textbox textDi2015NewLine    string newText = textBox1.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // What was there before, minus one character.Di2015NewLine    string previousLessOne = previousText == string.Empty ? string.Empty : previousText.Substring(0, previousText.Length - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Get where the user is, minus any preceding dashesDi2015NewLine    int caret = textBox1.SelectionStart - (textBox1.Text.Substring(0, textBox1.SelectionStart).Count(ch => ch == '-'));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the user has done anything other than delete the last character, ensure dashes are placed in the correct position.Di2015NewLine    if (newText.Length > 0 && newText != previousLessOne)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        textBox1.Text = string.Empty;Di2015NewLine        newText = newText.Replace("-", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < newText.Length; i += 5)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int length = Math.Min(newText.Length - i, 5);Di2015NewLine            textBox1.Text += newText.Substring(i, length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (length == 5)Di2015NewLine                textBox1.Text += '-';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Put the user back where they were, adjusting for dashes.Di2015NewLine    textBox1.SelectionStart = caret + (caret / 5);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    previousText = textBox1.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    processing = false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15255109Di2015UniqueSeparator// Run enough updates to catch up to the current timeDi2015NewLineprivate void Idle()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    double time = timer.Elapsed.TotalSeconds;Di2015NewLine    accumulatedTime += (time - lastTime);Di2015NewLine    lastTime = time;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const double frameTime = 1.0/60.0; // 60 frames per secondDi2015NewLine    while(accumulatedTime > frameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        world.Step((float)frameTime);Di2015NewLine        accumulatedTime -= frameTime;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15255162Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar source = new Subject<Thing>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar feed = source.Publish().RefCount();Di2015NewLinevar ofType1 = feed.Where(t => t.ActivationType == "Type1");Di2015NewLinevar ofType2 = feedDi2015NewLine    // only window the type2sDi2015NewLine    .Where(t => t.ActivationType == "Type2")Di2015NewLine    // our "end window selector" will be a tick 30s off from startDi2015NewLine    .Window(() => Observable.Timer(TimeSpan.FromSeconds(30)))Di2015NewLine    // we want the first one in each window...Di2015NewLine    .Select(lst => lst.Take(1))Di2015NewLine    // moosh them all back togetherDi2015NewLine    .Merge();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // We want all "type 1s" and the buffered outputs of "type 2s"Di2015NewLine    var query = ofType1.Merge(ofType2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Let's set up a fake stream of dataDi2015NewLine    var running = true;Di2015NewLine    var feeder = Task.Factory.StartNew(Di2015NewLine       () => { Di2015NewLine         // until we say stop...Di2015NewLine         while(running) Di2015NewLine         { Di2015NewLine             // pump new Things into the stream every 500msDi2015NewLine             source.OnNext(new Thing()); Di2015NewLine             Thread.Sleep(500); Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using(query.Subscribe(Console.WriteLine))Di2015NewLine    {               Di2015NewLine        // Block until we hit enter so we can see the live output Di2015NewLine        // from the above subscribe Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        // Shutdown our fake feederDi2015NewLine        running = false;Di2015NewLine        feeder.Wait();Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine

15257397Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class XmlHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Specifies whether XML attributes each appear on their own lineDi2015NewLine    const bool newLineOnAttributes = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool NewLineOnAttributes { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Serializes an object to an XML string, using the specified namespaces.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static string ToXml(object obj, XmlSerializerNamespaces ns)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type T = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var xs = new XmlSerializer(T);Di2015NewLine        var ws = new XmlWriterSettings { Indent = true, NewLineOnAttributes = newLineOnAttributes, OmitXmlDeclaration = true };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        using (XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(sb, ws))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            xs.Serialize(writer, obj, ns);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Serializes an object to an XML string.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static string ToXml(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var ns = new XmlSerializerNamespaces();Di2015NewLine        ns.Add("", "");Di2015NewLine        return ToXml(obj, ns);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Deserializes an object from an XML string.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static T FromXml<T>(string xml)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        XmlSerializer xs = new XmlSerializer(typeof(T));Di2015NewLine        using (StringReader sr = new StringReader(xml))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return (T)xs.Deserialize(sr);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Serializes an object to an XML file.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static void ToXmlFile(Object obj, string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var xs = new XmlSerializer(obj.GetType());Di2015NewLine        var ns = new XmlSerializerNamespaces();Di2015NewLine        var ws = new XmlWriterSettings { Indent = true, NewLineOnAttributes = NewLineOnAttributes, OmitXmlDeclaration = true };Di2015NewLine        ns.Add("", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (XmlWriter writer = XmlWriter.Create(filePath, ws))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            xs.Serialize(writer, obj);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Deserializes an object from an XML file.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static T FromXmlFile<T>(string filePath)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StreamReader sr = new StreamReader(filePath);Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var result = FromXml<T>(sr.ReadToEnd());Di2015NewLine            return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new Exception(e.InnerException.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sr.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15261190Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Returns the path root if absolute, or the topmost folder if relative.Di2015NewLine/// The original path is returned if no containers exist.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetTopmostFolder(string path)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (path.StartsWith(Path.DirectorySeparatorChar.ToString()))Di2015NewLine        path = path.Substring(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Uri inputPath;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (Uri.TryCreate(path, UriKind.Absolute, out inputPath))Di2015NewLine        return Path.GetPathRoot(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (Uri.TryCreate(path, UriKind.Relative, out inputPath))Di2015NewLine        return path.Split(Path.DirectorySeparatorChar)[0];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return path;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15263521Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static readonly Dictionary<char, char> PhoneMapping =Di2015NewLine    new Dictionary<char, char>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    { 'A', '2' }, { 'B', '2' }, { 'C', '2' },Di2015NewLine    { 'D', '3' }, { 'E', '3' }, { 'F', '3' },Di2015NewLine    { 'G', '4' }, { 'H', '4' }, { 'I', '4' },Di2015NewLine    { 'J', '5' }, { 'K', '5' }, { 'L', '5' }, Di2015NewLine    { 'M', '6' }, { 'N', '6' }, { 'O', '6' },Di2015NewLine    { 'P', '7' }, { 'Q', '7' }, { 'R', '7' }, { 'S', '7' },Di2015NewLine    { 'T', '8' }, { 'U', '8' }, { 'V', '8' },Di2015NewLine    { 'W', '9' }, { 'X', '9' }, { 'Y', '9' }, { 'Z', '9' }Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string ConvertLettersToPhoneNumbers(string letters)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    char[] replaced = new char[letters.Length];Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < replaced.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char replacement;Di2015NewLine        replaced[i] = PhoneMapping.TryGetValue(letters[i], out replacement)Di2015NewLine            ? replacement : letters[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return new string(replaced);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15263542Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication11Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var bookingStartsAndEnds = new List<DateTime>()Di2015NewLine                                           {Di2015NewLine                                               DateTime.Parse("1999-02-01 13:50:00"),Di2015NewLine                                               DateTime.Parse("1999-02-03 13:50:00"),Di2015NewLine                                               DateTime.Parse("1999-02-04 13:05:00"),Di2015NewLine                                               DateTime.Parse("1999-02-04 13:15:00"),Di2015NewLine                                           };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var bookedHours = bookingStartsAndEndsDi2015NewLine                // order by the date ascendingDi2015NewLine                .OrderBy(dt => dt)Di2015NewLine                // select only the "firsts" of the tuplesDi2015NewLine                .Where((dt, i) => i%2 == 0)Di2015NewLine                // select the first + the nextDi2015NewLine                .Select((dt, i) => Tuple.Create<DateTime, DateTime?>(dt, bookingStartsAndEnds.ElementAtOrDefault((i*2) + 1)))Di2015NewLine                // filter not-matching-end (the list must contain even number of items only!)Di2015NewLine                .Where(t => t.Item2 != null)Di2015NewLine                // calculate the time-difference between end-date and start-date and get all hoursDi2015NewLine                .Select(t => (t.Item2.Value - t.Item1).TotalHours)Di2015NewLine                // sum them upDi2015NewLine                .Sum(); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0:0.00} hours dude! this will be expensive...", bookedHours);Di2015NewLine            Console.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15274643Di2015UniqueSeparatorAssociateAndSave(int oId, int cId)
15274643Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    DeleteAllEntities();Di2015NewLine    CreateInitialEntities();Di2015NewLine    int oId = LoadOwnerId();Di2015NewLine    int cId = LoadChildId();Di2015NewLine    AssociateAndSave(oId, cId);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int LoadOwnerId()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var context = new ModelEntities())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (from o in context.OwnersDi2015NewLine                select o).First().Id;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static int LoadChildId()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var context = new ModelEntities())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (from c in context.ChildrenDi2015NewLine                select c).First().Id;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static void AssociateAndSave(int oId, int cId)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var context = new ModelEntities())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var owner = (from o in context.OwnersDi2015NewLine                        select o).FirstOrDefault(o => o.ID == oId);Di2015NewLine        var child = (from o in context.ChildrenDi2015NewLine                        select o).FirstOrDefault(c => c.ID == cId);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        owner.Children.Add(child);Di2015NewLine        context.Attach(owner);Di2015NewLine        context.SaveChanges();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15280060Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic DataTable PrepareDataTable(DataTable dtResults)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] subCategories = new string[3] {"Critical Down Time", "Critical Outage", "Total Repair Time"};Di2015NewLine    //make a copy of the original tableDi2015NewLine    DataTable dtOutput = dtResults.Clone();Di2015NewLine    DataRow drOutput = null;Di2015NewLine    DataRow[] drResults = null;Di2015NewLine    //retrieve the list of CategoriesDi2015NewLine    var categories = dtResults.AsEnumerable().Select(r => r["Category"]).Distinct().ToList();Di2015NewLine    //populate the new table with the appropriate rows (combinations of categories/subcategories)Di2015NewLine    foreach (string category in categories)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < subCategories.Length    ; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //create the new row in the new tableDi2015NewLine            drOutput = dtOutput.NewRow();Di2015NewLine            drOutput["Category"] = category;Di2015NewLine            drOutput["SubCategory"] = subCategories[i];Di2015NewLine            //here is where you will check to see if a row with the same category and subcategory exists in dtResults. if it does, then copy over the values for each columnDi2015NewLine            drResults = dtResults.Select(String.Format("Category = '{0}' AND SubCategory = '{1}'", category, subCategories[i]));Di2015NewLine            if(drResults.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach(DataColumn column in dtResults.Columns)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    drOutput[column.ColumnName] = drResults[0][column.ColumnName];Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            dtOutput.Rows.Add(drOutput);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        //add filler/spacer rowDi2015NewLine        drOutput = dtOutput.NewRow();Di2015NewLine        dtOutput.Rows.Add(drOutput);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return dtOutput;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15281806Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T[] Slice<T>(this T[] source, int fromIdx, int toIdx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T[] ret = new T[toIdx - fromIdx + 1];Di2015NewLine        for(int srcIdx=fromIdx, dstIdx = 0; srcIdx <= toIdx; srcIdx++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ret[dstIdx++] = source[srcIdx];Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static T[,] Slice<T>(this T[,] source, int fromIdxRank0, int toIdxRank0, int fromIdxRank1, int toIdxRank1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        T[,] ret = new T[toIdxRank0 - fromIdxRank0 + 1, toIdxRank1 - fromIdxRank1 + 1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int srcIdxRank0=fromIdxRank0, dstIdxRank0 = 0; srcIdxRank0 <= toIdxRank0; srcIdxRank0++, dstIdxRank0++)Di2015NewLine        {        Di2015NewLine            for(int srcIdxRank1=fromIdxRank1, dstIdxRank1 = 0; srcIdxRank1 <= toIdxRank1; srcIdxRank1++, dstIdxRank1++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ret[dstIdxRank0, dstIdxRank1] = source[srcIdxRank0, srcIdxRank1];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15291226Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void ReceiveAsync(int port, string address, IEnumerable<IPAddress> localAddresses)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IPAddress multicastAddress = IPAddress.Parse(address);Di2015NewLine    foreach (IPAddress localAddress in localAddresses)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var udpClient = new UdpClient(AddressFamily.InterNetwork);Di2015NewLine        udpClient.Client.SetSocketOption(SocketOptionLevel.Socket, SocketOptionName.ReuseAddress, true);Di2015NewLine        udpClient.Client.Bind(new IPEndPoint(localAddress, port));Di2015NewLine        udpClient.JoinMulticastGroup(multicastAddress, localAddress);Di2015NewLine        udpClient.BeginReceive(OnReceiveSink,Di2015NewLine                               new object[]Di2015NewLine                                   {Di2015NewLine                                       udpClient, new IPEndPoint(localAddress, ((IPEndPoint) udpClient.Client.LocalEndPoint).Port)Di2015NewLine                                   });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15291226Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void OnReceiveSink(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IPEndPoint ep = null;Di2015NewLine    var args = (object[]) result.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine    var session = (UdpClient) args[0];Di2015NewLine    var local = (IPEndPoint) args[1];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    byte[] buffer = session.EndReceive(result, ref ep);Di2015NewLine    //Do what you want here with the data of the bufferDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Message received from " + ep + " to " + local);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //We make the next call to the begin receiveDi2015NewLine    session.BeginReceive(OnReceiveSink, args);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15293475Di2015UniqueSeparator// swap x for ln(x)Di2015NewLinevar munged = SwapExpressionVisitor.Swap(Di2015NewLine    f, // the lambda to rewriteDi2015NewLine    f.Parameters[0], // "x"Di2015NewLine    Expression.Call(typeof(Math), "Log", null, f.Parameters[0]) // ln(x)Di2015NewLine); // (x, y) => (Sin((Log(x) / y)) + 5)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefunc = munged.Compile();Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(func(12, 5));Di2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(func(23, 4));Di2015NewLine
15293475Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass SwapExpressionVisitor : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<T> Swap<T>(Expression<T> lambda,Di2015NewLine        Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<T>(Di2015NewLine            Swap(lambda.Body, from, to), lambda.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public static Expression Swap(Di2015NewLine        Expression body, Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new SwapExpressionVisitor(from, to).Visit(body);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private readonly Expression from, to;Di2015NewLine    public SwapExpressionVisitor(Expression from, Expression to)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.from = from;Di2015NewLine        this.to = to;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public override Expression Visit(Expression node)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return node == from ? to : base.Visit(node);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15297126Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExpressionBuilderDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static Expression<T> Compose<T>(this Expression<T> first, Expression<T> second, Func<Expression, Expression, Expression> merge)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var map = first.Parameters.Select((f, i) => new { f, s = second.Parameters[i] }).ToDictionary(p => p.s, p => p.f);Di2015NewLine        var secondBody = ParameterRebinder.ReplaceParameters(map, second.Body);Di2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<T>(merge(first.Body, secondBody), first.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> And<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> first, Expression<Func<T, bool>> second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return first.Compose(second, Expression.And);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, bool>> Or<T>(this Expression<Func<T, bool>> first, Expression<Func<T, bool>> second)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return first.Compose(second, Expression.Or);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ParameterRebinder : ExpressionVisitorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<ParameterExpression, ParameterExpression> map;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ParameterRebinder(Dictionary<ParameterExpression, ParameterExpression> map)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.map = map ?? new Dictionary<ParameterExpression, ParameterExpression>();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Expression ReplaceParameters(Dictionary<ParameterExpression, ParameterExpression> map, Expression exp)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ParameterRebinder(map).Visit(exp);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected override Expression VisitParameter(ParameterExpression p)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ParameterExpression replacement;Di2015NewLine        if (map.TryGetValue(p, out replacement))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            p = replacement;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return base.VisitParameter(p);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15299370Di2015UniqueSeparatorif (tuplesToAdd.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // push the remaining itemsDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15299370Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate object lockObject = new Object();Di2015NewLineprivate object pushLock = new Object();Di2015NewLine
15299370Di2015UniqueSeparatortuplesToAdd
15299370Di2015UniqueSeparatorMonitor.Enter(lockObject); // acquires the lockDi2015NewLinetuplesToAdd.Add(tuple);Di2015NewLineif (tuplesToAdd.Count == 100000)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var tuplesToPush = tuplesToAdd;Di2015NewLine    tuplesToAdd = new List<tuple>(10000);Di2015NewLine    Monitor.Exit(lockObject);  // releases the lock so other threads can processDi2015NewLine    lock (pushLock)  // prevent multiple threads from pushing at the same timeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        inspace_.PutAll(tuplesToPush);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineelseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Monitor.Exit(lockObject);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15300502Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Science Fact: the "Grouper" (as in the Fish) is classified as:Di2015NewLine    //   Perciformes Serranidae EpinephelinaeDi2015NewLine    public static Expression<Func<T, object>> Epinephelinae<T>(Di2015NewLine         this IEnumerable<T> source, Di2015NewLine         string [] groupByNames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sourceType = typeof(T);Di2015NewLine    // define a dynamic type (read: anonymous type) for our needsDi2015NewLine    var dynAsm = AppDomainDi2015NewLine        .CurrentDomainDi2015NewLine        .DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine            new AssemblyName(Guid.NewGuid().ToString()), Di2015NewLine            AssemblyBuilderAccess.Run);Di2015NewLine    var dynMod = dynAsmDi2015NewLine         .DefineDynamicModule(Guid.NewGuid().ToString());Di2015NewLine    var typeBuilder = dynModDi2015NewLine         .DefineType(Guid.NewGuid().ToString());Di2015NewLine    var properties = groupByNamesDi2015NewLine        .Select(name => sourceType.GetProperty(name))Di2015NewLine        .Cast<MemberInfo>();Di2015NewLine    var fields = groupByNamesDi2015NewLine        .Select(name => sourceType.GetField(name))Di2015NewLine        .Cast<MemberInfo>();Di2015NewLine    var propFields = propertiesDi2015NewLine        .Concat(fields)Di2015NewLine        .Where(pf => pf != null);Di2015NewLine    foreach (var propField in propFields)Di2015NewLine    {        Di2015NewLine        typeBuilder.DefineField(Di2015NewLine            propField.Name, Di2015NewLine            propField.MemberType == MemberTypes.Field Di2015NewLine                ? 15302848Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ClosureClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void DoStuff()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(i);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    delegate void Writer();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var writers = new List<Writer>();Di2015NewLine        ClosureClass closure = new ClosureClass();Di2015NewLine        for (closure.i = 0; closure.i < 10; closure.i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writers.Add(closure.DoStuff);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Writer writer in writers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            writer();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15302908Di2015UniqueSeparatorFunc<T> getNodeDictionary
15302908Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static List<Dictionary<string, object>> BuildTree(int? parentNodeID = null, List<Node> exampleData = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // kickstart the recursion with example dataDi2015NewLine        if (exampleData == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            exampleData = new List<Node>();Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(null, 1, "Country"));Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(null, 2, "Year"));Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(1, 3, "President"));Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(1, 4, "Population"));Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(1, 5, "State"));Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(5, 6, "Governor"));Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(5, 7, "Population"));Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(5, 8, "County"));Di2015NewLine            exampleData.Add(new Node(8, 9, "Population"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<Dictionary<string, object>> result = new List<Dictionary<string, object>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var nodes = exampleData.Where(a => a.ParentNodeID == parentNodeID).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (nodes != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Func<Node, Dictionary<string, object>> getNodeDictionary = n => {Di2015NewLine                var children = BuildTree(n.NodeID, exampleData); // still recursiveDi2015NewLine                var returnDictionary = new Dictionary<string, object> { // these 2 nodes always get addedDi2015NewLine                    { "NodeID", n.NodeID},Di2015NewLine                    { "NodeText", n.NodeText }Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // This ensures we only add Children if there are actually any childrenDi2015NewLine                if (children.Any())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    returnDictionary.Add("Children", children);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return returnDictionary;Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // No need for where clause since we now do not add the empty elementsDi2015NewLine            result.AddRange(nodesDi2015NewLine                .Select(a => getNodeDictionary(a))Di2015NewLine                .ToList()Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15302924Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar wc = new WebClient();Di2015NewLinevar bytes = wc.DownloadData(new Uri(@"http://api.stackoverflow.com/1.1/questions"));Di2015NewLinestring responseText;Di2015NewLineusing (var outputStream = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var memoryStream = new MemoryStream(bytes))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var gzip = new GZipStream(memoryStream, CompressionMode.Decompress))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[1024];Di2015NewLine            int numBytes;Di2015NewLine            while ((numBytes = gzip.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                outputStream.Write(buffer, 0, numBytes);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        responseText = Encoding.UTF8.GetString(outputStream.ToArray());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine(responseText);Di2015NewLine

15303016Di2015UniqueSeparator[Test]Di2015NewLine[TestCase("parralele", "parallel", "par[ralele]")]Di2015NewLine[TestCase("personil", "personal", "person[i]l")]Di2015NewLine[TestCase("disfuncshunal", "dysfunctional", "d[isfuncshu]nal")]Di2015NewLine[TestCase("ato", "auto", "a[]to")]Di2015NewLine[TestCase("inactioned", "inaction", "inaction[ed]")]Di2015NewLine[TestCase("refraction", "fraction", "[re]fraction")]Di2015NewLine[TestCase("adiction", "ad[]diction", "ad[]iction")]Di2015NewLinepublic void CompareStringsTest(string attempted, string correct, string expectedResult)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int first = -1, last = -1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    string result = null;Di2015NewLine    int shorterLength = (attempted.Length < correct.Length ? attempted.Length : correct.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // First - [Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < shorterLength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (correct[i] != attempted[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            first = i;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Last - ]Di2015NewLine    var a = correct.Reverse().ToArray();Di2015NewLine    var b = attempted.Reverse().ToArray();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < shorterLength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (a[i] != b[i])Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            last = i;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (first == -1 && last == -1)Di2015NewLine        result = attempted;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        if (first == -1)Di2015NewLine            first = shorterLength;Di2015NewLine        if (last == -1)Di2015NewLine            last = shorterLength;Di2015NewLine        // If same letter repeats multiple times (ex: addition)Di2015NewLine        // and error is on that letter, we have to trim trail.Di2015NewLine        if (first + last > shorterLength)Di2015NewLine            last = shorterLength - first;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (first > 0)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(attempted.Substring(0, first));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.Append("[");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (last > -1 && last + first < attempted.Length)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(attempted.Substring(first, attempted.Length - last - first));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.Append("]");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (last > 0)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(attempted.Substring(attempted.Length - last, last));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        result = sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Assert.AreEqual(expectedResult, result);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15304251Di2015UniqueSeparatorPublic Class MyListBoxDi2015NewLine  Inherits ListBoxDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Private WM_KILLFOCUS As Integer = &H8Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  Protected Overrides Sub WndProc(ByRef m As Message)Di2015NewLine    If m.Msg <> WM_KILLFOCUS ThenDi2015NewLine      MyBase.WndProc(m)Di2015NewLine    End IfDi2015NewLine  End SubDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEnd ClassDi2015NewLine
15304394Di2015UniqueSeparator/*** Answer with the comments in code ***/Di2015NewLine// You can imagine that conversion operator as `cast constructor`, though Di2015NewLine// it can output an instance of target type in the ways other than a real Di2015NewLine// constructor. Di2015NewLine// The semantic model is `OutputType(InputType value)`Di2015NewLine// which means the LHS is of `OutputType` and RHS is of `InputType`. Di2015NewLine// For more information, see Di2015NewLine//      http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/85w54y0a.aspxDi2015NewLinestruct RomanNumeral {Di2015NewLine    public RomanNumeral(int value) {Di2015NewLine        // here the parameter `value` assiged to the field value ----+Di2015NewLine        this.value=value;                                         // |Di2015NewLine    }                                                             // |Di2015NewLine    //                                                               |Di2015NewLine    static public implicit operator RomanNumeral(int value) {     // |Di2015NewLine        // RomanNumeral(int value) is semantically tells that it     |Di2015NewLine        // outputs a `RomanNumeral` from taking an `int` like        |Di2015NewLine        // the constructor.                                          |Di2015NewLine        // Thus if there was a method `M(RomanNumeral x)`            |Di2015NewLine        // and called with M(3), then it's called with               |Di2015NewLine        // M((RomanNumeral)3) by effection of this implicit operator |Di2015NewLine        // and because it's implicit, you don't need to explicitly   |Di2015NewLine        // cast it.                                                  |Di2015NewLine        return new RomanNumeral(value);                           // |Di2015NewLine    }                                                             // |Di2015NewLine    //                                                               |Di2015NewLine    static public explicit operator int(RomanNumeral roman) {     // |Di2015NewLine        // Here the explicit operator just does the reverse thing    |Di2015NewLine        // of what the implicit operator does                        |Di2015NewLine        // However, because it's declared as explicit, you'll need   |Di2015NewLine        // to tell the compiler you want to cast explicitly, or the  |Di2015NewLine        // compiler treats statement like `int x=myRoman;` as an     |Di2015NewLine        // error where `myRoman` is assumed a `RomanNumeral`         |Di2015NewLine        // So you would write the statement as `int x=(int)myRoman;` |Di2015NewLine        // and it compiles.                                          |Di2015NewLine        return roman.value;                                       // |Di2015NewLine    }                                                             // |Di2015NewLine    //                                                               |Di2015NewLine    static public implicit operator string(RomanNumeral roman) {  // |Di2015NewLine        return ("Conversion not yet implemented");                // |Di2015NewLine    }                                                             // |Di2015NewLine    //                                                               |Di2015NewLine    private int value; // <------------------------------------------+ Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15304641Di2015UniqueSeparatorDistinct
15304641Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[]
15304641Di2015UniqueSeparatorIList<string>
15304641Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class IgnoreOrderComparer : IEqualityComparer<IList<string>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public IgnoreOrderComparer(StringComparer comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Comparer = comparer;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public StringComparer Comparer { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(IList<string> x, IList<string> y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x == null || y == null) return false;Di2015NewLine        // remove the Distincts if there are never duplicates as mentionedDi2015NewLine        return !x.Distinct(Comparer).Except(y.Distinct(Comparer), Comparer).Any();Di2015NewLine        // btw, this should work if the order matters:Di2015NewLine        // return x.SequenceEqual(y, Comparer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(IList<string> arr)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (arr == null) return int.MinValue;Di2015NewLine        int hash = 19;Di2015NewLine        foreach (string s in arr.Distinct(Comparer))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash = hash + s.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15304641Di2015UniqueSeparatorSortedDictionary<string, List<string>>
15304641Di2015UniqueSeparatorSortedDictionary<string, List<string>> dict = new SortedDictionary<string, List<string>>();Di2015NewLinedict.Add("A", new List<string>() { "A", "B" });Di2015NewLinedict.Add("B", new List<string>() { "B", "B" });Di2015NewLinedict.Add("C", new List<string>() { "A", "B" });Di2015NewLinedict.Add("D", new List<string>() { "C", "E" });Di2015NewLinedict.Add("E", new List<string>() { "E", "C" });Di2015NewLine
15304641Di2015UniqueSeparatorDistinct

15307106Di2015UniqueSeparatorIObservable<TResult> Feedback<T, TResult>(this IObservable<T> seed,Di2015NewLine                                          Func<T, IObservable<TResult>> produce,Di2015NewLine                                          Func<TResult, IObservable<T>> feed)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Observable.Create<TResult>(Di2015NewLine                      };Di2015NewLine                    Action<IObservable<T>, Action<T>> ssub =Di2015NewLine                        (o, n) =>Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine 15308923Di2015UniqueSeparator[JsonIgnore]Di2015NewLine[DefaultValue(0)]Di2015NewLinepublic int? Bar2Int;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic string Bar2Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   return { Bar2Int.HasValue ? this.Bar2Int.Value.ToString() : String.Empty; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15308951Di2015UniqueSeparator    const int Id1 = 0x1F;Di2015NewLine    const int Id2 = 0x8B;Di2015NewLine    const int DeflateCompression = 0x8;Di2015NewLine    const int GzipFooterLength = 8;Di2015NewLine    const int MaxGzipFlag = 32; Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Returns true if the stream could be a valid gzip header at the current position.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="stream">The stream to check.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Returns true if the stream could be a valid gzip header at the current position.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static bool IsHeaderCandidate(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Read the first ten bytes of the streamDi2015NewLine        byte[] header = new byte[10];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int bytesRead = stream.Read(header, 0, header.Length);Di2015NewLine        stream.Seek(-bytesRead, SeekOrigin.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (bytesRead < header.Length)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check the id tokens and compression algorithmDi2015NewLine        if (header[0] != Id1 || header[1] != Id2 || header[2] != DeflateCompression)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Extract the GZIP flags, of which only 5 are allowed (2 pow. 5 = 32)Di2015NewLine        if (header[3] > MaxGzipFlag)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check the extra compression flags, which is either 2 or 4 with the Deflate algorithmDi2015NewLine        if (header[8] != 0x0 && header[8] != 0x2 && header[8] != 0x4)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15309201Di2015UniqueSeparatorautoEvent

15309201Di2015UniqueSeparatorTest()
15309201Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace bothCallWaitOneDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  class ProgramDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    static AutoResetEvent autoEvent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      Test();Di2015NewLine      Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // two threads - waiting for the same autoreset eventDi2015NewLine      // start it unset i.e. closed i.e. anything calling WaitOne() will blockDi2015NewLine      //AutoResetEvent autoEvent = new AutoResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //WriteSomeMessageToTheConsole();Di2015NewLine      Thread thread1 = new Thread(new ThreadStart(WriteSomeMessageToTheConsole));Di2015NewLine      thread1.Name = "1111111111";Di2015NewLine      thread1.Start();  // this will now block until we set the eventDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Thread thread2 = new Thread(new ThreadStart(WriteSomeOtherMessageToTheConsole));Di2015NewLine      Thread thread2 = new Thread(new ThreadStart(WriteSomeOtherMessageToTheConsole));Di2015NewLine      thread2.Name = "222222222222";Di2015NewLine      thread2.Start();  // this will now also block until we set the eventDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // simulate some other stuffDi2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("Doing stuff...");Di2015NewLine      Thread.Sleep(5000);Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine("Stuff done.");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      // set the event - I thought this would mean both waiting threads are allowed to continueDi2015NewLine      // BUT thread2 runs and thread1 stays blocked indefinitelyDi2015NewLine      // So I guess I was wrong and that Set only releases one thread in WaitOne()?Di2015NewLine      // And why thread2 first?Di2015NewLine      autoEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void WriteSomeMessageToTheConsole()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      autoEvent.WaitOne();//Cannot relve symbol autoEventDi2015NewLine      while(true)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(Thread.CurrentThread.Name+"****");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void WriteSomeOtherMessageToTheConsole()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      autoEvent.WaitOne();//Cannot relve symbol autoEventDi2015NewLine      while(true)Di2015NewLine      Console.WriteLine(Thread.CurrentThread.Name);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15309326Di2015UniqueSeparator// Subclass of RoutedEventArgs that allows us to easily and nicely pass the messageDi2015NewLine// to be loggedDi2015NewLinepublic class LogEventArgs : RoutedEventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Msg { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public LogEventArgs(RoutedEvent routedEvent, Object sender, string Msg)Di2015NewLine        :base(routedEvent, sender)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Msg = Msg;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This is the Delegate that's used to grab the Log messageDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void RoutedLogEventHandler(Object sender, RoutedEventArgs e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// This works as the abstraction layer that will allow UC's to raise LOG messagesDi2015NewLine// and allow your implementation to alter the way it handles those LOG messages.Di2015NewLine// Since we're doing this with a routed event, we need an DependencyObject toDi2015NewLine// reigster it.Di2015NewLinepublic class LogServices :UIElementDi2015NewLine{        Di2015NewLine    public static RoutedEvent LogEvent;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Static constructor, registers the eventDi2015NewLine    static LogServices()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LogEvent = EventManager.RegisterRoutedEvent("Log", RoutingStrategy.Bubble, typeof(RoutedLogEventHandler), typeof(UIElement));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // This helps raise the relevant shared eventDi2015NewLine    public static void RaiseLog(string Msg, UIElement sender)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sender.RaiseEvent(new LogEventArgs(LogEvent, sender, Msg)); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15310845Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic int?[,] CreateAdjMatrix()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int?[,] adj = new int?[AllNodes.Count, AllNodes.Count];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < AllNodes.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Node n1 = AllNodes[i];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < AllNodes.Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Node n2 = AllNodes[j];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var arc = n1.Arcs.FirstOrDefault(a => a.Child == n2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (arc != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                adj[i, j] = arc.Weigth;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return adj;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15310845Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void PrintMatrix(ref int?[,] matrix, int Count)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.Write("       ");Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("{0}  ", (char)('A' + i));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < Count; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.Write("{0} | [ ", (char)('A' + i));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < Count; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (i == j)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(" &,");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (matrix[i, j] == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(" .,");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.Write(" {0},", matrix[i, j]);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.Write(" ]\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.Write("\\r\\n");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15312502Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void FindTasks(string taskName, string hostName, Action<Task> callback)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Regex regex = GetRegexForFindTask(taskName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using (TaskService ts = new TaskService(hostName))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Task t in ts.FindAllTasks(regex, true))Di2015NewLine            if (t.Name.Equals(taskName, StringComparison.OrdinalIgnoreCase))Di2015NewLine                callback(t);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15312600Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<HashSet<T>> MutuallyExclusive<T>(Di2015NewLine    this IEnumerable<T> available, Func<T, T, bool> exclusion)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var finished = new HashSet<HashSet<T>>(new HashSetEquality<T>());Di2015NewLine    return Recursion<T>(available, new HashSet<T>(), finished, exclusion);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static IEnumerable<HashSet<T>> Recursion<T>(Di2015NewLine    IEnumerable<T> available, HashSet<T> accepted, HashSet<HashSet<T>> finished,Di2015NewLine    Func<T, T, bool> exclusion)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (!available.Any())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (finished.Add(accepted))Di2015NewLine            yield return finished;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        foreach (T a in available)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var results = Recursion<T>(Di2015NewLine                available.Where(b => !exclusion(a, b)),Di2015NewLine                new HashSet<T>(accepted) { a }, finished, exclusion);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var set in results)Di2015NewLine                yield return set;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15312884Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid BreadthFirstTraversal(Graph graph, Vertex start)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /* A miracle happens */Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15312884Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid BreadthFirstTraversal(Graph graph, Vertex start)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /* make a queue of vertices */Di2015NewLine    /* make a mark set of vertices */Di2015NewLine    /* enqueue and mark start */Di2015NewLine    /* while the queue is not empty */Di2015NewLine        /* dequeue a vertext */Di2015NewLine        /* enqueue and mark all the unmarked neighbours of the vertex */Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15312884Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid BreadthFirstTraversal(Graph graph, Vertex start)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var queue = new VertexQueue();Di2015NewLine    var markSet = new VertexMarkSet();Di2015NewLine    queue.Enqueue(start);Di2015NewLine    markSet.Add(start);Di2015NewLine    while(queue.NotEmpty())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var vertex = queue.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine        foreach(Vertex neighbour in graph.ListNeighbours(vertex))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!markSet.Contains(neighbour))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                markSet.Add(neighbour);Di2015NewLine                queue.Enqueue(neighbour);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15320322Di2015UniqueSeparator public struct Transfer_packet Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public short  _packet_type; // 0 is action 1 is dataDi2015NewLine            public int _packet_len; // length of dataDi2015NewLine            public byte[] _data;//Content of data it's Length depends on objects types Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            public byte[] serialize()Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                byte[] arr;Di2015NewLine                MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine                arr = BitConverter.GetBytes(this._packet_type);Di2015NewLine               // Array.Reverse(arr);Di2015NewLine                ms.Write(arr, 0, arr.Length);Di2015NewLine                arr = BitConverter.GetBytes(this._packet_len);Di2015NewLine               // Array.Reverse(arr);Di2015NewLine                ms.Write(arr,0,arr.Length);Di2015NewLine                ms.Write(this._data, 0, this._data.Length);Di2015NewLine                arr = ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine               return arr;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

15322324Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic string Scrap(string Username, string Password)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string Url1 = "https://www.example.com";//first urlDi2015NewLine        string Url2 = "https://www.example.com/login.aspx";//secret url to post request toDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //first requestDi2015NewLine        CookieContainer jar = new CookieContainer();Di2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request1 = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(Url1);Di2015NewLine        request1.CookieContainer = jar;Di2015NewLine        //Get the response from the server and save the cookies from the first request..Di2015NewLine        HttpWebResponse response1 = (HttpWebResponse)request1.GetResponse();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //second requestDi2015NewLine        string postData = "***viewstate here***";//VIEWSTATEDi2015NewLine        HttpWebRequest request2 = (HttpWebRequest)WebRequest.Create(Url2);Di2015NewLine        request2.CookieContainer = jar;Di2015NewLine        request2.KeepAlive = true;Di2015NewLine        request2.Referer = Url2;Di2015NewLine        request2.Method = WebRequestMethods.Http.Post;Di2015NewLine        request2.Accept = "text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,*/*;q=0.8";Di2015NewLine        request2.UserAgent = "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1) AppleWebKit/535.2 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/15.0.874.121 Safari/535.2";Di2015NewLine        request2.ContentType = "application/x-www-form-urlencoded";Di2015NewLine        request2.AllowWriteStreamBuffering = true;Di2015NewLine        request2.ProtocolVersion = HttpVersion.Version11;Di2015NewLine        request2.AllowAutoRedirect = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] byteArray = Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(postData);Di2015NewLine        request2.ContentLength = byteArray.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Stream newStream = request2.GetRequestStream(); 15324114Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RequestFilter(IHttpRequest req, IHttpResponse res, object requestDto)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  IValidator validator = ValidatorCache.GetValidator(req, requestDto.GetType());Di2015NewLine  if (validator == null)Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  IRequiresHttpRequest requiresHttpRequest = validator as IRequiresHttpRequest;Di2015NewLine  if (requiresHttpRequest != null)Di2015NewLine    requiresHttpRequest.HttpRequest = req;Di2015NewLine  string httpMethod = req.HttpMethod;Di2015NewLine  ValidationResult result = validator.Validate(new ValidationContext(requestDto, (PropertyChain) null, (IValidatorSelector) new MultiRuleSetValidatorSelector(new string[1]Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    httpMethodDi2015NewLine  })));Di2015NewLine  if (result.IsValid)Di2015NewLine    return;Di2015NewLine  object errorResponse = DtoUtils.CreateErrorResponse(requestDto, ValidationResultExtensions.ToErrorResult(result));Di2015NewLine  ServiceStack.WebHost.Endpoints.Extensions.HttpResponseExtensions.WriteToResponse(res, req, errorResponse);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15324114Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Activate the validation mechanism, so every request DTO with an existing validatorDi2015NewLine    /// will be validated.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="appHost">The app host</param>Di2015NewLine    public void Register(IAppHost appHost)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Enabled) return;Di2015NewLine        Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine        // use my class instead of ServiceStack.ServiceInterface.Validation.ValidationFiltersDi2015NewLine        var filter = new MyValidationFilters();Di2015NewLine        appHost.RequestFilters.Add(filter.RequestFilter);Di2015NewLine        appHost.ResponseFilters.Add(filter.RequestFilter);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15324114Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static object CreateErrorResponse(object request, ValidationErrorResult validationError)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  ResponseStatus responseStatus = DtoUtils.ToResponseStatus(validationError);Di2015NewLine  return DtoUtils.CreateErrorResponse(request, (Exception) new ValidationError(validationError), responseStatus);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static object CreateErrorResponse(object request, Exception ex, ResponseStatus responseStatus)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  object responseDto = DtoUtils.CreateResponseDto(request, responseStatus);Di2015NewLine  IHttpError httpError = ex as IHttpError;Di2015NewLine  if (httpError != null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    if (responseDto != null)Di2015NewLine      httpError.Response = responseDto;Di2015NewLine    return (object) httpError;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    string errorCode = ex.GetType().Name;Di2015NewLine    string errorMessage = ex.Message;Di2015NewLine    if (responseStatus != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      errorCode = responseStatus.ErrorCode ?? errorCode;Di2015NewLine      errorMessage = responseStatus.Message ?? errorMessage;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return (object) new HttpError(responseDto, HttpRequestExtensions.ToStatusCode(ex), errorCode, errorMessage);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15324418Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct PointDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double X;Di2015NewLine    public double Y;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double Distance(Point otherPoint)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double deltaX = this.X - otherPoint.X;Di2015NewLine        double deltaY = this.Y - otherPoint.Y;Di2015NewLine        return System.Math.Sqrt(deltaX * deltaX + deltaY * deltaY);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("({0}, {1})", X, Y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic struct PolarDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double Radius;Di2015NewLine    public double Angle;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public double X { get { return Radius * System.Math.Cos(Angle); } }Di2015NewLine    public double Y { get { return Radius * System.Math.Sin(Angle); } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Point ToCartesian()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new Point() { X = X, Y = Y };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class CircleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public double Radius { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public Point Position { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15324418Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class CollisionResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public Circle Circle1 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public Circle Circle2 { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Point Circle1SafeLocation { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public Point Circle2SafeLocation { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Point CollisionLocation { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CollisionResult(Circle circle1, Circle circle2)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Circle1 = circle1;Di2015NewLine        this.Circle2 = circle2;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CalculateCollision()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        double distanceFromCentres = Circle1.Position.Distance(Circle2.Position);Di2015NewLine        if (distanceFromCentres >= Circle1.Radius + Circle2.Radius)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        double angleBetweenCircles = System.Math.Atan2(Circle2.Position.Y - Circle1.Position.Y, Circle2.Position.X - Circle1.Position.X);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Point midpointBetweenCircles = new Point(){X = (Circle1.Position.X + Circle2.Position.X)/2, Y = (Circle1.Position.Y + Circle2.Position.Y)/2};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Point circle1Offset = (new Polar() { Radius = Circle1.Radius, Angle = System.Math.PI + angleBetweenCircles }).ToCartesian();Di2015NewLine        Point circle2Offset = (new Polar() { Radius = Circle2.Radius, Angle = angleBetweenCircles }).ToCartesian();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        CollisionLocation = midpointBetweenCircles;Di2015NewLine        Circle1SafeLocation = new Point(){X = midpointBetweenCircles.X + circle1Offset.X, Y = midpointBetweenCircles.Y + circle1Offset.Y };Di2015NewLine        Circle2SafeLocation = new Point(){X = midpointBetweenCircles.X + circle2Offset.X, Y = midpointBetweenCircles.Y + circle2Offset.Y };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15324418Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void CheckCollision(Circle circle1, Circle circle2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    CollisionResult result = new CollisionResult(circle1, circle2);Di2015NewLine    if (result.CalculateCollision())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(String.Format("Collision detected at {0}! Safe location for circle 1: {1}, circle 2: {2}", result.CollisionLocation, result.Circle1SafeLocation, result.Circle2SafeLocation));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Did not collide.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar circle1 = new Circle() {Radius = 5, Position = new Point(){X = 0, Y = 0} };Di2015NewLinevar circle2 = new Circle() {Radius = 5, Position = new Point(){X = 10, Y = 0} };Di2015NewLinevar circle3 = new Circle() {Radius = 3, Position = new Point(){X = 0, Y = 1} };Di2015NewLinevar circle4 = new Circle() {Radius = 5, Position = new Point(){X = 3, Y = 7} };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCheckCollision(circle1, circle2);Di2015NewLineCheckCollision(circle3, circle4);Di2015NewLine

15325195Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void QuickSort<T>(List<T> a, int left, int right) where T : IComparable<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int i = left, j = right;Di2015NewLine    T pivot = a[(left + right) / 2];Di2015NewLine    while (i <= j)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (a[i].CompareTo(pivot) < 0)Di2015NewLine            i++;Di2015NewLine        while (a[j].CompareTo(pivot) > 0)Di2015NewLine            j--;Di2015NewLine        if (i <= j)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            T temp = a[i];Di2015NewLine            a[i++] = a[j];Di2015NewLine            a[j--] = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (left < j)Di2015NewLine        QuickSort(a, left, j);Di2015NewLine    if (i < right)Di2015NewLine        QuickSort(a, i, right);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15327450Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic struct HandCoordinateDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     public HandCoordinate(double x, double y, double time)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         this.X = x;Di2015NewLine         this.Y = y;Di2015NewLine         this.Time= time;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     public readonly double X;Di2015NewLine     public readonly double Y;Di2015NewLine     public readonly double Time;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static double Velocity(HandCoordinate p1, HandCoordinate p2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine     var time = p2.Time - p1.Time;Di2015NewLine     if (time <= 0)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine         throw new ArgumentException("Duplicate measurement");Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     var dx = p2.X - p1.X;Di2015NewLine     var dy = p2.Y - p1.Y;Di2015NewLine     var distance = Math.Sqrt(dx*dx + dy*dy);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // note the possibility for overflow if your times are very close together.Di2015NewLine     // You might need to use logarithms for the calculation.Di2015NewLine     return distance/time; Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar points = new SortedList<double,HandCoordinate>();Di2015NewLinepoints.Add(1.0, new HandCoordinate(1.0, 1.0, 1.0));Di2015NewLinepoints.Add(1.1, new HandCoordinate(1.0, 2.0, 1.1));Di2015NewLine..Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar velocities = points.ValuesDi2015NewLine                       .Skip(1)Di2015NewLine                       // note: because of the skip i in the following is the offsetDi2015NewLine                       // from the second element and can be used directly to referDi2015NewLine                       // to the previous elementDi2015NewLine                       .Select((p,i) => Velocity(points.Values[i],p))Di2015NewLine                       .ToList();Di2015NewLine

15328820Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar reader = new StreamReader(File.OpenRead(@"C:\\mthesaur.txt"));Di2015NewLinevar dict = new Dictionary<string, string>();Di2015NewLinewhile (!reader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Read the file line by line.Di2015NewLine    var line = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If the line isn't null, we can use it.  This shouldn't happen but it is a good sanity check.Di2015NewLine    if (line == null) continue;Di2015NewLine    // Split the line by the delimiter (a comma) so we can get the main word, the first one on the line.Di2015NewLine    var splitLine = line.Split(',');Di2015NewLine    var mainWord = splitLine[0];Di2015NewLine    // To save us from having to loop through and only get the indexes above 0 (eg, skip the main word) we will just simply remove it from the line so we have just synonyms.Di2015NewLine    line = line.Replace(mainWord + ",", string.Empty);Di2015NewLine    // Now we make use of the dictionary type in C# and add the mainword as the key and the synonyms as the value.Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        dict.Add(mainWord, line);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (ArgumentException argEx)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Attempted to add {0} to the dictionary but it already exists.", mainWord);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15338712Di2015UniqueSeparatorinternal class ContainerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Start { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime Stop { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return "ID " + Id + ": " + Start + " -> " + Stop;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15338712Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static IEnumerable<Container> DoMerge(List<Container> elements, TimeSpan maxDiff)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var closedContainers = new List<Container>();Di2015NewLine        var lastContainers = new Dictionary<int, Container>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Container container in elements.OrderBy(e => e.Start))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //First case, no previous containerDi2015NewLine            if (!lastContainers.ContainsKey(container.Id))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                lastContainers[container.Id] = container;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (container.Start - lastContainers[container.Id].Stop > maxDiff)Di2015NewLine                //We have a container, but not in our windows of 5 minutesDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                closedContainers.Add(lastContainers[container.Id]);Di2015NewLine                lastContainers[container.Id] = container;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //We have to merge our two containersDi2015NewLine                lastContainers[container.Id].Stop = container.Stop;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //We have now to put all "lastContainer" in our final listDi2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<int, Container> lastContainer in lastContainers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            closedContainers.Add(lastContainer.Value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return closedContainers;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15338712Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var elements = new List<Container>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                new Container {Id = 1, Start = new DateTime(2013, 3, 1, 18, 25, 26), Stop = new DateTime(2013, 3, 1, 18, 27, 29)},Di2015NewLine                new Container {Id = 1, Start = new DateTime(2013, 3, 1, 18, 30, 26), Stop = new DateTime(2013, 3, 1, 18, 34, 29)},Di2015NewLine                new Container {Id = 1, Start = new DateTime(2013, 3, 1, 18, 40, 26), Stop = new DateTime(2013, 3, 1, 18, 52, 29)},Di2015NewLine                new Container {Id = 1, Start = new DateTime(2013, 3, 1, 18, 55, 26), Stop = new DateTime(2013, 3, 1, 18, 59, 29)},Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        foreach (Container container in DoMerge(elements, TimeSpan.FromMinutes(5)))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(container);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15341079Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void ShowProperties(object o, int indent = 0)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    foreach (var prop in o.GetType().GetProperties(BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.Instance))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (typeof(IEnumerable).IsAssignableFrom(prop.PropertyType) && prop.PropertyType != typeof(string))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}:", string.Empty.PadRight(indent), prop.Name);Di2015NewLine            var coll = (IEnumerable)prop.GetValue(o, null);Di2015NewLine            if (coll != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (object sub in coll)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    ShowProperties(sub, indent + 1);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("{0}{1}: {2}", string.Empty.PadRight(indent), prop.Name, prop.GetValue(o, null));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("{0}------------", string.Empty.PadRight(indent));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15341837Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class LocalizedWeekPicker : LocalizedDatePickerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// An LocalizedDatePicker that disallows selecting any date that does not have the same DOW as the FirstDayOfWeek property.Di2015NewLine    /// It does this by disabling the dates N (currently=10) years forward and backward from today as well as automatically updating the dateDi2015NewLine    /// if you choose something more than 10 years away from today.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public LocalizedWeekPicker() : base()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Loaded += (s1, a1) => {Di2015NewLine            this.IsTodayHighlighted = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (SelectedDate.HasValue)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var tempDate = new DateTime(SelectedDate.Value.Ticks);Di2015NewLine                SelectedDate = DateTimeUtils.GetPreviousDateOnDayOfWeek(FirstDayOfWeek, tempDate);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            DisableDays();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            this.SelectedDateChanged += (s2, a2) => {Di2015NewLine                var tempDate = new DateTime(((DateTime)a2.AddedItems[0]).Ticks);Di2015NewLine                SelectedDate = DateTimeUtils.GetPreviousDateOnDayOfWeek(FirstDayOfWeek, tempDate);Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // goes forward and back n years and disables dates that don't have the same start DOW as the FirstDayOfWeekDi2015NewLine    private void DisableDays()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int years = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var current = DateTimeUtils.GetPreviousDateOnDayOfWeek(FirstDayOfWeek, DateTime.Now);Di2015NewLine        for (int weeks = 0; weeks < (52 * years); weeks++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.BlackoutDates.Add(new CalendarDateRange {Start = current.AddDays(1), End = current.AddDays(6)});Di2015NewLine            current = current.AddDays(7);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        current = DateTimeUtils.GetPreviousDateOnDayOfWeek(FirstDayOfWeek, DateTime.Now);Di2015NewLine        for (int weeks = 0; weeks < (52 * years); weeks++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.BlackoutDates.Add(new CalendarDateRange { Start = current.AddDays(1), End = current.AddDays(6) });Di2015NewLine            current = current.AddDays(-7);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15341925Di2015UniqueSeparator//--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Di2015NewLine// ! READ THIS BEFORE YOU WORK ON THIS CLASS. Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// The methods on this class must be written VERY carefully to avoid introducing security holes. Di2015NewLine// That's because they are invoked with special "this"! The "this" objectDi2015NewLine// for all of these methods are not SZArrayHelper objects. Rather, they are of type U[]Di2015NewLine// where U[] is castable to T[]. No actual SZArrayHelper object is ever instantiated. Thus, you willDi2015NewLine// see a lot of expressions that cast "this" "T[]". Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// This class is needed to allow an SZ array of type T[] to expose IList<T>, Di2015NewLine// IList<T.BaseType>, etc., etc. all the way up to IList<Object>. When the following call is Di2015NewLine// made:Di2015NewLine// Di2015NewLine//   ((IList<T>) (new U[n])).SomeIListMethod()Di2015NewLine//Di2015NewLine// the interface stub dispatcher treats this as a special case, loads up SZArrayHelper,Di2015NewLine// finds the corresponding generic method (matched simply by method name), instantiates Di2015NewLine// it for type <T> and executes it.Di2015NewLine// Di2015NewLine// The "T" will reflect the interface used to invoke the method. The actual runtime "this" will be Di2015NewLine// array that is castable to "T[]" (i.e. for primitivs and valuetypes, it will be exactlyDi2015NewLine// "T[]" - for orefs, it may be a "U[]" where U derives from T.) Di2015NewLine//---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------Di2015NewLine

         return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        _hWndSource.AddHook(WinProc);Di2015NewLine        IsViewing = true;Di2015NewLine        return 15355477Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void CheckPrecedence(char currentOp, ref Stack<double> values, ref Stack<char> operators,Di2015NewLine                                        Dictionary<char, int> operatorList)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char lastStackOp = operators.Peek();Di2015NewLine        //if same precedence of both Op are sameDi2015NewLine        //OR lastOp > than CurrentOpDi2015NewLine        while (((operatorList[lastStackOp] == operatorList[currentOp]) ||Di2015NewLine            (operatorList[lastStackOp] > operatorList[currentOp])))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var TopMostOperand = values.Pop();Di2015NewLine            var PrevOperand = values.Pop();Di2015NewLine            var TopMostOperator = operators.Pop();Di2015NewLine            values.Push(calculateExpression(TopMostOperator, TopMostOperand, PrevOperand));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (operators.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lastStackOp = operators.Peek();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        operators.Push(currentOp);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15355477Di2015UniqueSeparator    {'*',new OperatorInfo('(',"OpenBracket",5,OperatorFixity.Left)},Di2015NewLine    {'^',new OperatorInfo(')',"CloseBracket",5,OperatorFixity.Left)}Di2015NewLine
15355477Di2015UniqueSeparatorelse if (IsOperator(expression[i]))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Maintain precedence on stackDi2015NewLine    if (operators.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       CheckPrecedence(expression[i], ref values, ref operators, operatorList);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        operators.Push(expression[i]);//runs first time onlyDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15355477Di2015UniqueSeparatorelse if (IsOperator(expression[i]))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //Maintain precedence on stackDi2015NewLine    if (operators.Count > 0 && expression[i] != '(' && expression[i] != ')')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        CheckPrecedence(expression[i], ref values, ref operators, operatorList);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (expression[i] == ')')Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        while (operators.Peek() != '(')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var lastOperator = operators.Pop();Di2015NewLine            var LastOperand = values.Pop();Di2015NewLine            var PrevOperand = values.Pop();Di2015NewLine            values.Push(calculateExpression(lastOperator, LastOperand, PrevOperand));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        operators.Pop();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        operators.Push(expression[i]);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
