15357065Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing ProtoBuf;Di2015NewLineusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var path = "big.blob";Di2015NewLine        WriteFile(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int channelTotal = 0, pointTotal = 0;Di2015NewLine        foreach(var channel in ReadChannels(path))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            channelTotal++;Di2015NewLine            pointTotal += channel.Points.Count;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Read: {0} points in {1} channels", pointTotal, channelTotal);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static void WriteFile(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] channels = {"up", "down", "top", "bottom", "charm", "strange"};Di2015NewLine        var rand = new Random(123456);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int totalPoints = 0, totalChannels = 0;Di2015NewLine        using (var encoder = new DataEncoder(path, "My file"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < 100; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var channel = new Channel {Di2015NewLine                    Name = channels[rand.Next(channels.Length)]Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                int count = rand.Next(1, 50);Di2015NewLine                var data = new List<float>(count);Di2015NewLine                for (int j = 0; j < count; j++)Di2015NewLine                    data.Add((float)rand.NextDouble());Di2015NewLine                channel.Points = data;Di2015NewLine                encoder.AddChannel(channel);Di2015NewLine                totalPoints += count;Di2015NewLine                totalChannels++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Wrote: {0} points in {1} channels; {2} bytes", totalPoints, totalChannels, new FileInfo(path).Length);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public class ChannelDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Name { get; set; }Di2015NewLine        public List<float> Points { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public class DataEncoder : IDisposableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private Stream stream;Di2015NewLine        private ProtoWriter writer;Di2015NewLine        public DataEncoder(string path, string recordingName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            stream = File.Create(path);Di2015NewLine            writer = new ProtoWriter(stream, null, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (recordingName != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ProtoWriter.WriteFieldHeader(1, WireType.String, writer);Di2015NewLine                ProtoWriter.WriteString(recordingName, writer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void AddChannel(Channel channel)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ProtoWriter.WriteFieldHeader(2, WireType.StartGroup, writer);Di2015NewLine            var channelTok = ProtoWriter.StartSubItem(null, writer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (channel.Name != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                ProtoWriter.WriteFieldHeader(1, WireType.String, writer);Di2015NewLine                ProtoWriter.WriteString(channel.Name, writer);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            var list = channel.Points;Di2015NewLine            if (list != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                switch(list.Count)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case 0:Di2015NewLine                        // nothing to writeDi2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case 1:Di2015NewLine                        ProtoWriter.WriteFieldHeader(2, WireType.Fixed32, writer);Di2015NewLine                        ProtoWriter.WriteSingle(list[0], writer);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        ProtoWriter.WriteFieldHeader(2, WireType.String, writer);Di2015NewLine                        var dataToken = ProtoWriter.StartSubItem(null, writer);Di2015NewLine                        ProtoWriter.SetPackedField(2, writer);Di2015NewLine                        foreach (var val in list)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ProtoWriter.WriteFieldHeader(2, WireType.Fixed32, writer);Di2015NewLine                            ProtoWriter.WriteSingle(val, writer);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        ProtoWriter.EndSubItem(dataToken, writer);Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            ProtoWriter.EndSubItem(channelTok, writer);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (writer) { if (writer != null) writer.Close(); }Di2015NewLine            writer = null;Di2015NewLine            using (stream) { if (stream != null) stream.Close(); }Di2015NewLine            stream = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<Channel> ReadChannels(string path)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var file = File.OpenRead(path))Di2015NewLine        using (var reader = new ProtoReader(file, null, null))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            while (reader.ReadFieldHeader() > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch (reader.FieldNumber)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case 1:Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Recording name: {0}", reader.ReadString());Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    case 2: // each "2" instance represents a different "Channel" or a channel switchDi2015NewLine                        var channelToken = ProtoReader.StartSubItem(reader);Di2015NewLine                        int floatCount = 0;Di2015NewLine                        List<float> list = new List<float>();Di2015NewLine                        Channel channel = new Channel { Points = list };Di2015NewLine                        while (reader.ReadFieldHeader() > 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            switch (reader.FieldNumber)Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                case 1:Di2015NewLine                                    channel.Name = reader.ReadString();Di2015NewLine                                    break;Di2015NewLine                                case 2:Di2015NewLine                                    switch (reader.WireType)Di2015NewLine                                    {Di2015NewLine                                        case WireType.String: // packed array - multiple floatsDi2015NewLine                                            var dataToken = ProtoReader.StartSubItem(reader);Di2015NewLine                                            while (ProtoReader.HasSubValue(WireType.Fixed32, reader))Di2015NewLine                                            {Di2015NewLine                                                list.Add(reader.ReadSingle());Di2015NewLine                                                floatCount++;Di2015NewLine                                            }Di2015NewLine                                            ProtoReader.EndSubItem(dataToken, reader);Di2015NewLine                                            break;Di2015NewLine                                        case WireType.Fixed32: // simple floatDi2015NewLine                                            list.Add(reader.ReadSingle());Di2015NewLine                                            floatCount++; // got 1Di2015NewLine                                            break;Di2015NewLine                                        default:Di2015NewLine                                            Console.WriteLine("Unexpected data wire-type: {0}", reader.WireType);Di2015NewLine                                            break;Di2015NewLine                                    }Di2015NewLine                                    break;Di2015NewLine                                default:Di2015NewLine                                    Console.WriteLine("Unexpected field in channel: {0}/{1}", reader.FieldNumber, reader.WireType);Di2015NewLine                                    reader.SkipField();Di2015NewLine                                    break;Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        ProtoReader.EndSubItem(channelToken, reader);Di2015NewLine                        yield return channel;Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        Console.WriteLine("Unexpected field in recording: {0}/{1}", reader.FieldNumber, reader.WireType);Di2015NewLine                        reader.SkipField();Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15370414Di2015UniqueSeparator        <script runat="server">Di2015NewLine            protected void btnUS_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.US.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine                this.Metric.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            protected void btnMetric_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                this.US.Visible = false;Di2015NewLine                this.Metric.Visible = true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine             protected void calcUS_Click()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine              //do the computation hereDi2015NewLine              resultus.text = //put the results hereDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        </script>Di2015NewLine    </h4>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              <asp:label ID="lbl1" Text="Height:" runat="server" />Di2015NewLine                 <asp:TextBox ID="heightus" runat="server" />feet<br />Di2015NewLine                 <asp:TextBox ID="heightus1" runat="server" />inch(es)<br />Di2015NewLine              <asp:Label ID="lbl2" Text="Weight:" runat="server" />Di2015NewLine                 <asp:TextBox ID="weightus" runat="server" />lbs<br />Di2015NewLine            <br />Di2015NewLine                 <asp:Button ID="calcUS" Text="Calculate" runat="server" Di2015NewLine    onclick="calcUS_Click" />Di2015NewLine                 <asp:Button ID="clearUS" Text="Clear" runat="server"/> Di2015NewLine            <br /><br />Di2015NewLine              <asp:Label ID="lbl3" Text="Results:" runat="server" />Di2015NewLine                 <asp:TextBox ID="resultus" runat="server" /> <br />Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine</div>Di2015NewLine
15370465Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate double[,] general_foo(double[,] a, int dimension)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var w = a.GetLength(0);Di2015NewLine    var h = a.GetLength(1);Di2015NewLine    var result = new double[w, h];Di2015NewLine    var otherDimension = 1 - dimension; // NOTE only works for 2D arraysDi2015NewLine    var otherDimensionLength = a.GetLength(otherDimension);Di2015NewLine    var dimensionLength = a.GetLength(dimension);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < dimensionLength; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < otherDimensionLength; j++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var setIndexes = new int[2] { j, j };Di2015NewLine            setIndexes[dimension] = i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var beforeIndexes = new int[2] { j, j };Di2015NewLine            beforeIndexes[dimension] = Math.Max(i - 1, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var afterIndexes = new int[2] { j, j };Di2015NewLine            afterIndexes[dimension] = Math.Min(i + 1, dimensionLength - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var beforeValue = (double)a.GetValue(beforeIndexes);Di2015NewLine            var afterValue = (double)a.GetValue(afterIndexes);Di2015NewLine            result.SetValue((afterValue - beforeValue) * 0.5, setIndexes);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine} Di2015NewLine
15370465Di2015UniqueSeparator// Iterates through every item in a multidementional array arrayDi2015NewLineprivate Array MutateArray<T>(Array a, Func<T, int[], T> selector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var rank = a.Rank;Di2015NewLine    var lengths = Enumerable.Range(0, a.Rank)Di2015NewLine                            .Select(r => a.GetLength(r))Di2015NewLine                            .ToArray(); // Get length of a in each dimensionDi2015NewLine    var result = Array.CreateInstance(typeof(T), lengths);Di2015NewLine    var index = new int[a.Rank];Di2015NewLine    foreach (T item in a) // flattens arrayDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        result.SetValue(selector(item, index), index);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Get next index value (I'm sure this could be improved)Di2015NewLine        for (var d = 0; d < rank; d++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (index[d] == lengths[d] - 1)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                index[d] = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                index[d]++;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// Your "foo" methodDi2015NewLineprivate double[,] generic_foo(double[,] a, int d)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var upperD = a.GetUpperBound(d);Di2015NewLine    return (double[,])MutateArray<double>(a, (x, i) =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var prev = i.ToArray(); // cloneDi2015NewLine        prev[d] = Math.Max(prev[d] - 1, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var next = i.ToArray(); // cloneDi2015NewLine        next[d] = Math.Min(next[d] + 1, upperD);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var prevVal = (double)a.GetValue(prev);Di2015NewLine        var nextVal = (double)a.GetValue(next);Di2015NewLine        return (nextVal - prevVal) * 0.5;Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15370497Di2015UniqueSeparatorKeyValuePair

15370617Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<List<T>> ToRuns<T, TKey>(Di2015NewLine            this IEnumerable<T> source, Di2015NewLine            Func<T, TKey> keySelector) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (var enumerator = source.GetEnumerator()) Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine                yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var currentSet = new List<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // inspect the first itemDi2015NewLine            var lastKey = keySelector(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine            currentSet.Add(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (enumerator.MoveNext()) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var newKey = keySelector(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine                if (!Equals(newKey, lastKey)) Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // A difference == new run; return what we've got thus farDi2015NewLine                    yield return currentSet;Di2015NewLine                    lastKey = newKey;Di2015NewLine                    currentSet = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                currentSet.Add(enumerator.Current);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return the last run.Di2015NewLine            yield return currentSet;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // and clean upDi2015NewLine            currentSet = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine            lastKey = default(TKey);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15370617Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<List<T>>

15372801Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool CheckExists(string url)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   Uri uri = new Uri(url);Di2015NewLine   if (uri.IsFile) // File is localDi2015NewLine      return System.IO.File.Exists(uri.LocalPath);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   tryDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      HttpWebRequest request = WebRequest.Create(uri) as HttpWebRequest;Di2015NewLine      request.Method = "HEAD"; // No need to download the whole thingDi2015NewLine      HttpWebResponse response = request.GetResponse() as HttpWebResponse;Di2015NewLine      return (response.StatusCode == HttpStatusCode.OK); // Return true if the file existsDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   catchDi2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      return false; // URL does not existDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

The variable 'client' loses scope when this function exits.Di2015NewLine    //    You may want to consider making it a class variable, so it doesn'tDi2015NewLine    //    get disposed early.Di2015NewLine    WebClient client = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine    client.DownloadStringCompleted += new DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(HttpsCompleted);Di2015NewLine    // 2.            localServerPath = serverPath;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public override ICredentials CredentialsDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine           throw new ArgumentNullException("absoluteUri");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            //resolve resources from cache (if possible) Di2015NewLine            if (absoluteUri.Scheme == "http" && enableHttpCaching && (ofObjectToReturn == null || ofObjectToReturn == typeof(Stream)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                /*Try to resolve it from the local path if it exists*/Di2015NewLine                if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(localServerPath) && absoluteUri.AbsolutePath.EndsWith(".dtd") && !absoluteUri.AbsoluteUri.StartsWith(localServerPath))Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                WebRequest webReq = WebRequest.Create(absoluteUri);Di2015NewLine                webReq.CachePolicy = new credentials;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                WebResponse resp = webReq.GetResponse();Di2015NewLine                return resp.GetResponseStream();Di2015NewLine   return base.GetEntity(absoluteUri, role, ofObjectToReturn);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15382916Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ByKeyComparer<T, TKey> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Func<T, TKey> _keySelector;Di2015NewLine    private readonly IComparer<TKey> _keyComparer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ByKeyComparer(Func<T, TKey> keySelector, IComparer<TKey> keyComparer = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (keySelector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("keySelector");Di2015NewLine        _keySelector = keySelector;Di2015NewLine        _keyComparer = keyComparer ?? Comparer<TKey>.Default;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return _keyComparer.Compare(_keySelector(x), _keySelector(y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15382916Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ByKeyComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IComparer<T> Create<TKey>(Func<T, TKey> keySelector, IComparer<TKey> keyComparer = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ByKeyComparer<T, TKey>(keySelector, keyComparer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15382916Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar patchVersionComparer = ByKeyComparer<Patch>.Create(p => p.Version);Di2015NewLinepatches.Sort(patchVersionComparer);Di2015NewLine
15382916Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass CompositeComparer<T> : IComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly IEnumerable<IComparer<T>> _comparers;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CompositeComparer(IEnumerable<IComparer<T>> comparers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (comparers == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("comparers");Di2015NewLine        _comparers = comparers;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public CompositeComparer(params IComparer<T>[] comparers)Di2015NewLine        : this((IEnumerable<IComparer<T>>)comparers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Compare(T x, T y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (var comparer in _comparers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int result = comparer.Compare(x, y);Di2015NewLine            if (result != 0)Di2015NewLine                return result;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15382916Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar comparer = new CompositeComparer<Patch>(Di2015NewLine                       ByKeyComparer<Patch>.Create(p => p.Key1),Di2015NewLine                       ByKeyComparer<Patch>.Create(p => p.Key2),Di2015NewLine                       ByKeyComparer<Patch>.Create(p => p.Key3));Di2015NewLinepatches.Sort(comparer);Di2015NewLine
15382916Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic class ByKeyComparer<T>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IComparer<T> CompareBy<TKey>(Func<T, TKey> keySelector, IComparer<TKey> keyComparer = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ByKeyComparer<T, TKey>(keySelector, keyComparer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ComparerExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IComparer<T> ThenBy<T, TKey>(this IComparer<T> comparer, Func<T, TKey> keySelector, IComparer<TKey> keyComparer = null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var newComparer = ByKeyComparer<T>.CompareBy(keySelector, keyComparer);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var composite = comparer as CompositeComparer<T>;Di2015NewLine        if (composite != null)Di2015NewLine            return new CompositeComparer<T>(composite.Comparers.Concat(new[] { newComparer }));Di2015NewLine        return new CompositeComparer<T>(comparer, newComparer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15383164Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic XmlNode makeXPath(XmlDocument doc, string xpath, string innertext)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string[] partsOfXPath = xpath.Split('/');Di2015NewLine        XmlNode node = null;Di2015NewLine        if (doc.SelectSingleNode(xpath) != null) {Di2015NewLine            //get the parentDi2015NewLine            node = doc.SelectSingleNode(string.Join("/", partsOfXPath, 0, partsOfXPath.Length-1));Di2015NewLine            node = node.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement(xpath));Di2015NewLine            node.InnerText = innertext.TrimStart(' ');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else {Di2015NewLine            for (int xpathPos = partsOfXPath.Length; xpathPos > 0; xpathPos--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                string subXpath = string.Join("/", partsOfXPath, 0, xpathPos);Di2015NewLine                node = doc.SelectSingleNode(subXpath);Di2015NewLine                if (node != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // append new descendantsDi2015NewLine                    for (int newXpathPos = xpathPos; newXpathPos < partsOfXPath.Length; newXpathPos++)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        node = node.AppendChild(doc.CreateElement(partsOfXPath[newXpathPos]));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    break;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            node.InnerText = innertext.TrimStart(' ');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return node;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15383574Di2015UniqueSeparatorViewLocator.LocateForModel = (model, displayLocation, context) =>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var viewAware = model as IViewAware;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Added these 3 lines - the rest is from CM sourceDi2015NewLine    // Try cast the model to IProvideContextDi2015NewLine    var provideContext = model as IProvideContext;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Check if the cast succeeded, and if the context wasn't already set (by attached prop), if we're ok, set the context to the models context propertyDi2015NewLine    if (provideContext != null && context == null)Di2015NewLine         context = provideContext.Context;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (viewAware != null)Di2015NewLine    {                    Di2015NewLine        var view = viewAware.GetView(context) as UIElement;Di2015NewLine        if (view != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine#if !SILVERLIGHT && !WinRTDi2015NewLine            var windowCheck = view as Window;Di2015NewLine            if (windowCheck == null || (!windowCheck.IsLoaded && !(new WindowInteropHelper(windowCheck).Handle == IntPtr.Zero)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                LogManager.GetLog(typeof(ViewLocator)).Info("Using cached view for {0}.", model);Di2015NewLine                return view;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine#elseDi2015NewLine            LogManager.GetLog(typeof(ViewLocator)).Info("Using cached view for {0}.", model);Di2015NewLine            return view;Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ViewLocator.LocateForModelType(model.GetType(), displayLocation, context);Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLine

15384980Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class HtmlExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static IHtmlString DropDownListForEnum(this HtmlHelper htmlHelper)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var model = htmlHelper.ViewData.Model;Di2015NewLine        if (model == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("You must have a model in order to use this method");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        var enumType = model.GetType();Di2015NewLine        if (!enumType.IsEnum)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("This method works only with enum types.");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var fields = enumType.GetFields(Di2015NewLine            BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.GetField | BindingFlags.PublicDi2015NewLine        );Di2015NewLine        var values = Enum.GetValues(enumType).OfType<object>();Di2015NewLine        var items =Di2015NewLine            from value in valuesDi2015NewLine            from field in fieldsDi2015NewLine            let descriptionAttribute = fieldDi2015NewLine                .GetCustomAttributes(Di2015NewLine                    typeof(DescriptionAttribute), trueDi2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine                .OfType<DescriptionAttribute>()Di2015NewLine                .FirstOrDefault()Di2015NewLine            let description = (descriptionAttribute != null)Di2015NewLine                ? descriptionAttribute.DescriptionDi2015NewLine                : value.ToString()Di2015NewLine            where value.ToString() == field.NameDi2015NewLine            select new { Id = value, Name = description };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var selectList = new SelectList(items, "Id", "Name", model);Di2015NewLine        return htmlHelper.DropDownList("", selectList);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Demo.MessageInspector;Di2015NewLineusing Demo.Utilities;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Demo.WebServicesDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class MyWebService : IMyWebService, IServiceBehaviorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public void MyWebServiceMethod()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get the activityId from the incoming message propertiesDi2015NewLine            var activityIdProperty = OperationContext.Current.IncomingMessagePropertiesDi2015NewLine                .FirstOrDefault(property => property.Key == Properties.ActivityId.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // create an empty GuidDi2015NewLine            Guid activityId = new Guid();Di2015NewLine            if 15395139Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T Min<T>(this T[,] arr) where T : IComparableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool minSet = false;Di2015NewLine    T min = default(T);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < arr.GetLength(0); i++)Di2015NewLine        for (int j = 0; j < arr.GetLength(1); j++)Di2015NewLine            if (!minSet)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                minSet = true;Di2015NewLine                min = arr[i, j];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            else if (arr[i, j].CompareTo(min) < 0)Di2015NewLine                min = arr[i, j];Di2015NewLine    return min;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15396693Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine    //create an array of 10 million items that are randomly orderedDi2015NewLine    var list = Enumerable.Range(1, 10000000).OrderBy(x => Guid.NewGuid()).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var sw = Stopwatch.StartNew();Di2015NewLine    var slowOrder = list.OrderBy(x => x).Skip(10).Take(10).ToList();Di2015NewLine    sw.Stop();Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    //Took ~8 seconds on my machineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sw.Restart();Di2015NewLine    var smallVal = Quickselect(list, 11);Di2015NewLine    var largeVal = Quickselect(list, 20);Di2015NewLine    var elements = list.Where(el => el >= smallVal && el <= largeVal).OrderBy(el => el);Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine(sw.ElapsedMilliseconds);Di2015NewLine    //Took ~1 second on my machineDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static T Quickselect<T>(IList<T> list , int k) where T : IComparable {Di2015NewLine    Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine    int r = rand.Next(0, list.Count);Di2015NewLine    T pivot = list[r];Di2015NewLine    List<T> smaller = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    List<T> larger = new List<T>();Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in list) {Di2015NewLine        var comparison = element.CompareTo(pivot);Di2015NewLine        if (comparison == -1) {Di2015NewLine            smaller.Add(element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if (comparison == 1) {Di2015NewLine            larger.Add(element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (k <= smaller.Count) {Di2015NewLine        return Quickselect(smaller, k);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else if (k > list.Count - larger.Count) {Di2015NewLine        return Quickselect(larger, k - (list.Count - larger.Count));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    else {Di2015NewLine        return pivot;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15396967Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ObservableHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Buffers entries that do no satisfy the <paramref name="shouldFlush"/> condition, using a circular buffer with a maxDi2015NewLine    /// capacity. When an entry that satisfies the condition ocurrs, then it flushes the circular buffer and the new entry,Di2015NewLine    /// and starts buffering again.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <typeparam name="T">The type of entry.</typeparam>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="stream">The original stream of events.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="shouldFlush">The condition that defines whether the item and the buffered entries are flushed.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="bufferSize">The buffer size for accumulated entries.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>An observable that has this filtering capability.</returns>Di2015NewLine    public static IObservable<T> FlushOnTrigger<T>(this IObservable<T> stream, Func<T, bool> shouldFlush, int bufferSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (stream == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("stream");Di2015NewLine        if (shouldFlush == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("shouldFlush");Di2015NewLine        if (bufferSize < 1) throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("bufferSize");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return System.Reactive.Linq.Observable.Create<T>(observer =>Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var buffer = new CircularBuffer<T>(bufferSize);Di2015NewLine            var subscription = stream.Subscribe(Di2015NewLine                newItem =>Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        bool result;Di2015NewLine                        tryDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            result = shouldFlush(newItem);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            return;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (result)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            foreach (var buffered in buffer.TakeAll())Di2015NewLine                            {Di2015NewLine                                observer.OnNext(buffered);Di2015NewLine                            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            observer.OnNext(newItem);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            buffer.Add(newItem);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    },Di2015NewLine                observer.OnError,Di2015NewLine                observer.OnCompleted);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return subscription;Di2015NewLine        });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15396967Di2015UniqueSeparator        dataDi2015NewLine            .FlushOnTrigger(item => item == 'X', bufferSize: 2)Di2015NewLine            .Subscribe(Console.WriteLine);Di2015NewLine

15397613Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic unsafe List<Result> CalculateFocusValues(string filename)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  using(Bitmap bmp = new Bitmap(filename))Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    int width  = bmp.Width;Di2015NewLine    int height = bmp.Height;Di2015NewLine    int bpp = Bitmap.GetPixelFormatSize(bmp.PixelFormat) / 8;Di2015NewLine    BitmapData data = bmp.LockBits(new Rectangle(0, 0, width, height), ImageLockMode.ReadOnly, bmp.PixelFormat);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long sum = 0, squaredSum = 0;Di2015NewLine    int[] histogram = new int[256];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int absoluteGradientThreshold = 148;Di2015NewLine    long absoluteGradientSum = 0;Di2015NewLine    long thresholdedAbsoluteGradientSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int squaredGradientThreshold = 64;Di2015NewLine    long squaredGradientSum = 0;Di2015NewLine    long thresholdedSquaredGradientSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int brennerGradientThreshold = 184;Di2015NewLine    long brennerGradientSum = 0;Di2015NewLine    long thresholdedBrennerGradientSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    long autocorrelationSum1 = 0;Di2015NewLine    long autocorrelationSum2 = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int contentThreshold = 35;Di2015NewLine    long thresholdedContentSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int pixelCountThreshold = 76;Di2015NewLine    long thresholdedPixelCountSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    const int imagePowerThreshold = 40;Di2015NewLine    long imagePowerSum = 0;Di2015NewLine    long thresholdedImagePowerSum = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for(int row = 0; row < height - 1; row++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      for(int col = 0; col < width - 1; col++)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        int current = *((byte *) (data.Scan0 + (row + 0) * data.Stride + (col + 0) * bpp));Di2015NewLine        int col1    = *((byte *) (data.Scan0 + (row + 0) * data.Stride + (col + 1) * bpp));Di2015NewLine        int row1    = *((byte *) (data.Scan0 + (row + 1) * data.Stride + (col + 0) * bpp));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int squared = current * current;Di2015NewLine        sum += current;Di2015NewLine        squaredSum += squared;Di2015NewLine        histogram[current]++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int colDiff1 = col1 - current;Di2015NewLine        int rowDiff1 = row1 - current;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int absoluteGradient = Math.Abs(colDiff1) + Math.Abs(rowDiff1);Di2015NewLine        absoluteGradientSum += absoluteGradient;Di2015NewLine        if(absoluteGradient >= absoluteGradientThreshold)Di2015NewLine          thresholdedAbsoluteGradientSum += absoluteGradient;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int squaredGradient = colDiff1 * colDiff1 + rowDiff1 * rowDiff1;Di2015NewLine        squaredGradientSum += squaredGradient;Di2015NewLine        if(squaredGradient >= squaredGradientThreshold)Di2015NewLine          thresholdedSquaredGradientSum += squaredGradient;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(row < bmp.Height - 2 && col < bmp.Width - 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine          int col2    = *((byte *) (data.Scan0 + (row + 0) * data.Stride + (col + 2) * bpp));Di2015NewLine          int row2    = *((byte *) (data.Scan0 + (row + 2) * data.Stride + (col + 0) * bpp));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          int colDiff2 = col2 - current;Di2015NewLine          int rowDiff2 = row2 - current;Di2015NewLine          int brennerGradient = colDiff2 * colDiff2 + rowDiff2 * rowDiff2;Di2015NewLine          brennerGradientSum += brennerGradient;Di2015NewLine          if(brennerGradient >= brennerGradientThreshold)Di2015NewLine            thresholdedBrennerGradientSum += brennerGradient;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine          autocorrelationSum1 += current * col1 + current * row1;Di2015NewLine          autocorrelationSum2 += current * col2 + current * row2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(current >= contentThreshold)Di2015NewLine          thresholdedContentSum += current;Di2015NewLine        if(current <= pixelCountThreshold)Di2015NewLine          thresholdedPixelCountSum++;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        imagePowerSum += squared;Di2015NewLine        if(current >= imagePowerThreshold)Di2015NewLine          thresholdedImagePowerSum += current * current;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    bmp.UnlockBits(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int pixels = width * height;Di2015NewLine    double mean = (double) sum / pixels;Di2015NewLine    double meanDeviationSquared = (double) squaredSum / pixels;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int rangeMin = 0;Di2015NewLine    while(histogram[rangeMin] == 0)Di2015NewLine      rangeMin++;Di2015NewLine    int rangeMax = histogram.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine    while(histogram[rangeMax] == 0)Di2015NewLine      rangeMax--;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    double entropy = 0.0;Di2015NewLine    double log2 = Math.Log(2);Di2015NewLine    for(int i = rangeMin; i <= rangeMax; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if(histogram[i] > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        double p = (double) histogram[i] / pixels;Di2015NewLine        entropy -= p * Math.Log(p) / log2;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return new List<Result>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      new Result("AbsoluteGradient",            absoluteGradientSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("ThresholdedAbsoluteGradient", thresholdedAbsoluteGradientSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("SquaredGradient",             squaredGradientSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("ThresholdedSquaredGradient",  thresholdedSquaredGradientSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("BrennerGradient",             brennerGradientSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("ThresholdedBrennerGradient",  thresholdedBrennerGradientSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("Variance",                    meanDeviationSquared - mean * mean),Di2015NewLine      new Result("Autocorrelation",             autocorrelationSum1 - autocorrelationSum2),Di2015NewLine      new Result("StdevBasedCorrelation",       -(autocorrelationSum1 - pixels * mean * mean)),Di2015NewLine      new Result("Range",                       rangeMax - rangeMin),Di2015NewLine      new Result("Entropy",                     -entropy),Di2015NewLine      new Result("ThresholdedContent",          -thresholdedContentSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("ThresholdedPixelCount",       thresholdedPixelCountSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("ImagePower",                  -imagePowerSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("ThresholdedImagePower",       -thresholdedImagePowerSum),Di2015NewLine      new Result("JpegSize",                    new FileInfo(filename).Length),Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  public string Algorithm { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine  public double Value     { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public Result(string algorithm, double value)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Algorithm = algorithm;Di2015NewLine    Value     = value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15403522Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate Dictionary<int, int> GetColumnDictionary(string headerLine)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<int, int> columnDictionary = new Dictionary<int, int>();Di2015NewLine        List<string> columnNames = headerLine.Split('|').ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string maxTierObjectColumnName = GetMaxTierObjectColumnName(columnNames);Di2015NewLine        for (int index = 0; index < columnNames.Count; index++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (columnNames[index] == "StatisticID")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                columnDictionary.Add(0, index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (columnNames[index] == "FileId")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                columnDictionary.Add(1, index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (columnNames[index] == maxTierObjectColumnName)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                columnDictionary.Add(2, index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (columnNames[index] == "Status")Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                columnDictionary.Add(3, index);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return columnDictionary;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string GetMaxTierObjectColumnName(List<string> columnNames)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Edit this function if Tier ObjectId is greater then 9Di2015NewLine        var maxTierObjectColumnName = columnNames.Where(c => c.Contains("Tier") && c.Contains("Object")).OrderBy(c => c).Last();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return maxTierObjectColumnName;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15403522Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<DataObject> ParseFile(string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StreamReader streamReader = new StreamReader(fileName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string headerLine = streamReader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<int, int> columnDictionary = this.GetColumnDictionary(headerLine);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string line;Di2015NewLine        List<DataObject> dataObjects = new List<DataObject>();Di2015NewLine        while ((line = streamReader.ReadLine()) != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var lineValues = line.Split('|');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string statId = lineValues[columnDictionary[0]];Di2015NewLine            dataObjects.Add(Di2015NewLine                new DataObject()Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    StatisticId = lineValues[columnDictionary[0]],Di2015NewLine                    FileId = lineValues[columnDictionary[1]],Di2015NewLine                    ObjectId = lineValues[columnDictionary[2]],Di2015NewLine                    Status = lineValues[columnDictionary[3]]Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            );Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return dataObjects;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15403592Di2015UniqueSeparator[SerializableAttribute]
15403592Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Serialize() Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Create a hashtable of values that will eventually be serialized.Di2015NewLine    SortedList<string, string> addresses = new SortedList<string, string>();Di2015NewLine    addresses.Add("Jeff", "123 Main Street, Redmond, WA 98052");Di2015NewLine    addresses.Add("Fred", "987 Pine Road, Phila., PA 19116");Di2015NewLine    addresses.Add("Mary", "PO Box 112233, Palo Alto, CA 94301");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // To serialize the hashtable and its key/value pairs,  Di2015NewLine    // you must first open a stream for writing. Di2015NewLine    // In this case, use a file stream.Di2015NewLine    FileStream fs = new FileStream(@"C:data.dat", FileMode.Create);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Construct a BinaryFormatter and use it to serialize the data to the stream.Di2015NewLine    BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        formatter.Serialize(fs, addresses);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (SerializationException e) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Failed to serialize. Reason: " + e.Message);Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finally Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15403592Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static void Deserialize() Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine    // Declare the hashtable reference.Di2015NewLine    SortedList<string, string> addresses = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Open the file containing the data that you want to deserialize.Di2015NewLine    FileStream fs = new FileStream(@"C:data.dat", Di2015NewLine        FileMode.Open);Di2015NewLine    try Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BinaryFormatter formatter = new BinaryFormatter();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Deserialize the hashtable from the file and Di2015NewLine        // assign the reference to the local variable.Di2015NewLine        addresses = (SortedList<string, string>) formatter.Deserialize(fs);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (SerializationException e) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Failed to deserialize. Reason: " + e.Message);Di2015NewLine        throw;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    finally Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        fs.Close();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // To prove that the table deserialized correctly, Di2015NewLine    // display the key/value pairs.Di2015NewLine    foreach (var de in addresses) Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} lives at {1}.", de.Key, de.Value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15409333Di2015UniqueSeparator<local:MyDocumentViewer x:Name="documentViewer"  />Di2015NewLine
15409333Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// DocumentViewer that has his Search Box overridden in order to select multiple results in the document.Di2015NewLine/// Use IsMultiSearchEnabled to turn off this behavior.Di2015NewLine/// The number of results can be limited with the MaxSearchResults property.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic class MyDocumentViewer : DocumentViewerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private ToolBar _myfindToolbar; // MS.Internal.Documents.FindToolBarDi2015NewLine    private object _mydocumentScrollInfo; // MS.Internal.Documents.DocumentGridDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private MethodInfo _miFind; // DocumentViewerBase.Find(FindToolBar)Di2015NewLine    private MethodInfo _miGoToTextBox; // FindToolBar.GoToTextBox()Di2015NewLine    private MethodInfo _miMakeSelectionVisible; // DocumentGrid.MakeSelectionVisible()Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Limit for returned search results. 0 for no limit, default is int.MaxValue.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public int MaxSearchResults { get { return (int)GetValue(MaxSearchResultsProperty); } set { SetValue(MaxSearchResultsProperty, value); } }Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty MaxSearchResultsProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("MaxSearchResults", typeof(int), typeof(MyDocumentViewer), new PropertyMetadata(int.MaxValue));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines if the search of the find toolbox is overridden and multiple search results are selected in the document.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public bool IsMultiSearchEnabled { get { return (bool)GetValue(IsMultiSearchEnabledProperty); } set { SetValue(IsMultiSearchEnabledProperty, value); } }Di2015NewLine    public static readonly DependencyProperty IsMultiSearchEnabledProperty =Di2015NewLine        DependencyProperty.Register("IsMultiSearchEnabled", typeof(bool), typeof(MyDocumentViewer), new PropertyMetadata(true));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void OnApplyTemplate()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        base.OnApplyTemplate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsMultiSearchEnabled)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // get some private fields from the base class DocumentViewerDi2015NewLine            _myfindToolbar = this.GetType().GetPrivateFieldOfBase("_findToolbar").GetValue(this) as ToolBar;Di2015NewLine            _mydocumentScrollInfo = this.GetType().GetPrivateFieldOfBase("_documentScrollInfo").GetValue(this);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // replace button click handler of find toolbarDi2015NewLine            EventInfo evt = _myfindToolbar.GetType().GetEvent("FindClicked");Di2015NewLine            ReflectionHelper.RemoveEventHandler(_myfindToolbar, evt.Name); // remove existing handlerDi2015NewLine            evt.AddEventHandler(_myfindToolbar, new EventHandler(OnFindInvoked)); // attach own handlerDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get some methods that will need to be invokedDi2015NewLine            _miFind = this.GetType().GetMethod("Find", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance);Di2015NewLine            _miGoToTextBox = _myfindToolbar.GetType().GetMethod("GoToTextBox");Di2015NewLine            _miMakeSelectionVisible = _mydocumentScrollInfo.GetType().GetMethod("MakeSelectionVisible");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// This is replacing DocumentViewer.OnFindInvoked(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private void OnFindInvoked(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        IList allSegments = null; // collection of text segmentsDi2015NewLine        TextRange findResult = null; // could also use object, does not need typeDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Give ourselves focus, this ensures that the selectionDi2015NewLine        //will be made visible after it's made.Di2015NewLine        this.Focus();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Drill down to the list of selected text segments: DocumentViewer.TextEditor.Selection.TextSegmentsDi2015NewLine        object textEditor = this.GetType().GetProperty("TextEditor", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic).GetValue(this); // System.Windows.Documents.TextEditorDi2015NewLine        object selection = textEditor.GetType().GetProperty("Selection", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance).GetValue(textEditor); // System.Windows.Documents.TextSelectionDi2015NewLine        FieldInfo fiTextSegments = selection.GetType().GetPrivateFieldOfBase("_textSegments");Di2015NewLine        IList textSegments = fiTextSegments.GetValue(selection) as IList; // List<System.Windows.Documents.TextSegment>Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Clearing the selection in order to start search from the beginning of the document. I suspect there might be a better way of doing this.Di2015NewLine        object segmentStart = textSegments[0].GetType().GetField("_start", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance).GetValue(textSegments[0]); // get segment start (one textsegment is always present)Di2015NewLine        int currentOffset = (int)segmentStart.GetType().GetProperty("System.Windows.Documents.ITextPointer.Offset", BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance).GetValue(segmentStart); // get offset of segment startDi2015NewLine        segmentStart = segmentStart.GetType().GetMethod("CreatePointer", new Type[] { segmentStart.GetType(), typeof(int) }).Invoke(segmentStart, new object[] { segmentStart, -currentOffset }); // set the offset back to 0Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        textSegments[0] = textSegments[0].GetType().GetConstructor(BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance, null, new Type[] { segmentStart.GetType(), segmentStart.GetType() }, null) Di2015NewLine                                                   .Invoke(new object[] { segmentStart, segmentStart}); // create a new textsegment with resetted offsetDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 1; i < textSegments.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            textSegments.RemoveAt(i); // remove all other segmentsDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Always search downDi2015NewLine        _myfindToolbar.GetType().GetProperty("SearchUp").SetValue(_myfindToolbar, false);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Search and collect the find resultsDi2015NewLine        int resultCount = 0;Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // invoke: DocumentViewerBase.Find(findToolBar)Di2015NewLine            findResult = _miFind.Invoke(this, new object[] { _myfindToolbar }) as TextRange;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (findResult != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // get the selected TextSegments of the searchDi2015NewLine                textSegments = fiTextSegments.GetValue(selection) as IList; // List<System.Windows.Documents.TextSegment>Di2015NewLine                if (allSegments == null)Di2015NewLine                    allSegments = textSegments; // first search find, set whole collectionDi2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                    allSegments.Add(textSegments[0]); // after first find, add to collectionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                resultCount++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        while (findResult != null && (MaxSearchResults == 0 || resultCount < MaxSearchResults)); // stop if no more results were found or limit is exceededDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (allSegments == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // alert the user that we did not find anythingDi2015NewLine            string searchText = _myfindToolbar.GetType().GetProperty("SearchText").GetValue(_myfindToolbar) as string;Di2015NewLine            string messageString = string.Format("Searched the document. Cannot find '{0}'.", searchText);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(messageString, "Find", MessageBoxButton.OK, MessageBoxImage.Asterisk);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // set the textsegments field to the collected search resultsDi2015NewLine            fiTextSegments.SetValue(selection, allSegments);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // this marks the text. invoke: DocumentGrid.MakeSelectionVisible()Di2015NewLine            _miMakeSelectionVisible.Invoke(_mydocumentScrollInfo, null);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // put the focus back on the findtoolbar textbox to search again. invoke: FindToolBar.GoToTextBox()Di2015NewLine        _miGoToTextBox.Invoke(_myfindToolbar, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ReflectionExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets private field of base class. Normally, they are not directly accessible in a GetField call.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public static FieldInfo GetPrivateFieldOfBase(this Type type, string fieldName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        BindingFlags bindingFlags = BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.NonPublic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Declare variablesDi2015NewLine        FieldInfo fieldInfo = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Search as long as there is a typeDi2015NewLine        while (type != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Use reflectionDi2015NewLine            fieldInfo = type.GetField(fieldName, bindingFlags);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Yes, do we have a field?Di2015NewLine            if (fieldInfo != null) break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Get base classDi2015NewLine            type = type.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Return resultDi2015NewLine        return fieldInfo;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// http://www.codeproject.com/Articles/103542/Removing-Event-Handlers-using-ReflectionDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLinepublic static class ReflectionHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static Dictionary<Type, List<FieldInfo>> dicEventFieldInfos = new Dictionary<Type, List<FieldInfo>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static BindingFlags AllBindingsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return BindingFlags.IgnoreCase | BindingFlags.Public | BindingFlags.NonPublic | BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Static; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static List<FieldInfo> GetTypeEventFields(Type t)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (dicEventFieldInfos.ContainsKey(t))Di2015NewLine            return dicEventFieldInfos[t];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<FieldInfo> lst = new List<FieldInfo>();Di2015NewLine        BuildEventFields(t, lst);Di2015NewLine        dicEventFieldInfos.Add(t, lst);Di2015NewLine        return lst;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void BuildEventFields(Type t, List<FieldInfo> lst)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //BindingFlags.FlattenHierarchy only works on protected & public, doesn't work because fields are privateDi2015NewLine        // Uses .GetEvents and then uses .DeclaringType to get the correct ancestor type so that we can get the FieldInfo.Di2015NewLine        foreach (EventInfo ei in t.GetEvents(AllBindings))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type dt = ei.DeclaringType;Di2015NewLine            FieldInfo fi = dt.GetField(ei.Name, AllBindings);Di2015NewLine            if (fi != null)Di2015NewLine                lst.Add(fi);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static EventHandlerList GetStaticEventHandlerList(Type t, object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MethodInfo mi = t.GetMethod("get_Events", AllBindings);Di2015NewLine        return (EventHandlerList)mi.Invoke(obj, new object[] { });Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RemoveAllEventHandlers(object obj) { RemoveEventHandler(obj, ""); }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RemoveEventHandler(object obj, string EventName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine            return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type t = obj.GetType();Di2015NewLine        List<FieldInfo> event_fields = GetTypeEventFields(t);Di2015NewLine        EventHandlerList static_event_handlers = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (FieldInfo fi in event_fields)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (EventName != "" && string.Compare(EventName, fi.Name, true) != 0)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // STATIC Events have to be treated differently from INSTANCE Events...Di2015NewLine            if (fi.IsStatic)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (static_event_handlers == null)Di2015NewLine                    static_event_handlers = GetStaticEventHandlerList(t, obj);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                object idx = fi.GetValue(obj);Di2015NewLine                Delegate eh = static_event_handlers[idx];Di2015NewLine                if (eh == null)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Delegate[] dels = eh.GetInvocationList();Di2015NewLine                if (dels == null)Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                EventInfo ei = t.GetEvent(fi.Name, AllBindings);Di2015NewLine                foreach (Delegate del in dels)Di2015NewLine                    ei.RemoveEventHandler(obj, del);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                EventInfo ei = t.GetEvent(fi.Name, AllBindings);Di2015NewLine                if (ei != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    object val = fi.GetValue(obj);Di2015NewLine                    Delegate mdel = (val as Delegate);Di2015NewLine                    if (mdel != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        foreach (Delegate del in mdel.GetInvocationList())Di2015NewLine                            ei.RemoveEventHandler(obj, del);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15412134Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring plaintext;Di2015NewLinebyte[] Key = Convert.FromBase64String("Ii7oSjjWuhp6J6/hj/wmivqx1h3N2HzJ2ByJOy1n89E=");Di2015NewLinestring encryptedbase64Password = "hRVlbM79aEQi8Tz7JJIL7CEhSxZAJvCh8Ni6ORP1C55+qbJzjDshBYBjyP12/zT2";Di2015NewLinebyte[] IV = new byte[16];Di2015NewLinebyte[] phase = Convert.FromBase64String(encryptedbase64Password);Di2015NewLineArray.Copy(phase, 0, IV, 0, IV.Length);Di2015NewLinebyte[] cipherText = new byte[phase.Length - 16];;Di2015NewLineArray.Copy(phase, 16, cipherText, 0, cipherText.Length);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (AesManaged aesAlg = new AesManaged())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    aesAlg.KeySize = 256;Di2015NewLine    aesAlg.Mode = CipherMode.CBC;Di2015NewLine    aesAlg.Padding = PaddingMode.PKCS7;Di2015NewLine    aesAlg.Key = Key;Di2015NewLine    aesAlg.IV = IV;Di2015NewLine    // Create a decryptor to perform the stream transform.Di2015NewLine    // NOTE: This is the difference between my original solution and the correct one.Di2015NewLine    ICryptoTransform decryptor = aesAlg.CreateDecryptor(aesAlg.Key, aesAlg.IV);Di2015NewLine    // Create the streams used for decryption.Di2015NewLine    using (MemoryStream msDecrypt = new MemoryStream(cipherText))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (CryptoStream csDecrypt = new CryptoStream(msDecrypt, decryptor, CryptoStreamMode.Read))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (StreamReader srDecrypt = new StreamReader(csDecrypt))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Read the decrypted bytes from the decrypting stream and place them in a string.Di2015NewLine                plaintext = srDecrypt.ReadToEnd();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15414325Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class RepositoryToLoggerAdapter : ILoggerDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private IRepository adaptee;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public InfrastructureLoggerToDatabaseAdapter(IRepository adaptee)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.adaptee = adaptee;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Write(string data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var log = new Log() { Value = data };Di2015NewLine            adaptee.Create(log);   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            ILogger logger = new InfrastructureDebugLogger();Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("Data: ");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            string data = Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //This step is redundant as the text will be shown on the screen as you typeDi2015NewLinelogger.Write(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Create an object of IRepository type.Di2015NewLineIRepository repository= new LogRepository();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//The create method works as it shouldDi2015NewLinerepository.Create(data);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//You could not have stored the repository object in the logger variable if you did not have this adapter.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            logger = new RepositoryToLoggerAdapter(repository);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Effectively you now are calling the Create method of the Repository by calling the Write method of the logger.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            logger.Write(data);Di2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

15414601Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<IEnumerable<T>> GroupWhile<T>(this IEnumerable<T> sourceDi2015NewLine    , Func<T, T, bool> predicate)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (var iterator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        List<T> currentGroup = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLine        while (iterator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (predicate(currentGroup.Last(), iterator.Current))Di2015NewLine                currentGroup.Add(iterator.Current);Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return currentGroup;Di2015NewLine                currentGroup = new List<T>() { iterator.Current };Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        yield return currentGroup;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

     queryTimer.Tick -= queryTimer_Tick;Di2015NewLine            queryTimer = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void RestartQueryTimer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Start or reset a pending queryDi2015NewLine        if (queryTimer == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            queryTimer = new Timer { Enabled = true, Interval = 15417805Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate static Func<object, object, object> GenAddFunc(Type elementType)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var param1Expr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine    var param2Expr = Expression.Parameter(typeof(object));Di2015NewLine    var addExpr = Expression.Add(Expression.Convert(param1Expr, elementType), Expression.Convert(param2Expr, elementType));Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<object, object, object>>(Expression.Convert(addExpr, typeof(object)), param1Expr, param2Expr).Compile();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIEnumerable<object> listValues;Di2015NewLineType elementType = listValues.First().GetType();Di2015NewLinevar addFunc = GenAddFunc(elementType);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineobject sum = listValues.Aggregate(addFunc);Di2015NewLine

15418625Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<MyFile> Diff(Node index1, Node index2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var Index1Files = FindFiles(index1);Di2015NewLine    var Index2Files = FindFiles(index2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //this is all of the files in bothDi2015NewLine    var intersection = new HashSet<string>(Index1Files.Select(file => file.Checksum)Di2015NewLine         .Intersect(Index2Files.Select(file => file.Checksum)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return Index1Files.Concat(Index2Files)Di2015NewLine        .Where(file => !intersection.Contains(file.Checksum))Di2015NewLine        .ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15421347Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetHashCode
15421347Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic override int GetHashCode()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int hash = 23;Di2015NewLine    uncheckedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hash *= 17 + A.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        hash *= 17 + B.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        hash *= 17 + C.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        // the same applies with the rest of your properties ...Di2015NewLine        // collections must be treated differently:Di2015NewLine        if(L != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash *= 17 + L.Length;Di2015NewLine            foreach(var d in L)Di2015NewLine                hash *= 17 + d.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (M != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash *= 17 + M.Length;Di2015NewLine            foreach (var d in M)Di2015NewLine                hash *= 17 + d.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine        }         Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

15422172Di2015UniqueSeparator    private static readonly SortedDictionary<string, List<string>> synonymList Di2015NewLine            = new SortedDictionary<string, List<string>>Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                {"but", new List<string> { "however" }},Di2015NewLine                {"take", new List<string> { "abduct", "abstract", "accroach"}},Di2015NewLine                {"beat", new List<string> {"hit", "lash", "punch", "shake"}},Di2015NewLine                {"end",  new List<string> {"butt", "confine", "cusp"}}Di2015NewLine            };Di2015NewLine
15422172Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<string> AlternativesOf(string arg)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //First of all, build up a 2d array of all your optionsDi2015NewLine        var words = arg.Split(' ').Select(w=> w.ToLower()).ToList();Di2015NewLine        var options = new List<List<string>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (var word in words)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (synonymList.ContainsKey(word))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Add the original word to the list of synonymsDi2015NewLine                options.Add(synonymList[word]Di2015NewLine                               .Concat(new List<string> { word }).ToList());Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Just use the original word onlyDi2015NewLine                options.Add(new List<string> { word });Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Now return all permutations of the 2d options arrayDi2015NewLine        return AllPermutationsOf("", options, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15422172Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<string> AllPermutationsOfDi2015NewLine           (string sentence, List<List<string>> options, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (count == options.Count)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return sentence;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            foreach (string option in options[count])Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                foreach (var childOption in AllPermutationsOfDi2015NewLine                             (sentence + " " + option, options, count + 1))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return childOption;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
15422172Di2015UniqueSeparator string testSentence = "Take it or beat it.";Di2015NewLine var alternatives = AlternativesOf(testSentence).ToList();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /*  Output:Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            abduct it or hit it.Di2015NewLine            abduct it or lash it.Di2015NewLine            abduct it or punch it.Di2015NewLine            abduct it or shake it.Di2015NewLine            abduct it or beat it.Di2015NewLine            abstract it or hit it.Di2015NewLine            abstract it or lash it.Di2015NewLine            abstract it or punch it.Di2015NewLine            abstract it or shake it.Di2015NewLine            abstract it or beat it.Di2015NewLine            accroach it or hit it.Di2015NewLine            accroach it or lash it.Di2015NewLine            accroach it or punch it.Di2015NewLine            accroach it or shake it.Di2015NewLine            accroach it or beat it.Di2015NewLine            take it or hit it.Di2015NewLine            take it or lash it.Di2015NewLine            take it or punch it.Di2015NewLine            take it or shake it.Di2015NewLine            take it or beat it. */Di2015NewLine

15422634Di2015UniqueSeparatorMyClass
15422634Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyNamedLockDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Mutex mtx = null;Di2015NewLine    private string _strLkName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // to know if finally we get lockDi2015NewLine    bool cNeedToBeRelease = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyNamedLock(string strLockName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _strLkName = strLockName;Di2015NewLine        //...Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        mtx = new Mutex(false, _strLkName, out bCreatedNew, mSec);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool enterLockWithTimeout(int nmsWait = 30 * 1000)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _nmsWaitLock = nmsWait;Di2015NewLine        bool cLock = false;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            cLock = mtx.WaitOne(nmsWait, false);Di2015NewLine            cNeedToBeRelease = cLock;    Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (AbandonedMutexException)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // http://stackoverflow.com/questions/654166/wanted-cross-process-synch-that-doesnt-suffer-from-abandonedmutexexceptionDi2015NewLine            // http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.threading.abandonedmutexexception.aspxDi2015NewLine            cNeedToBeRelease = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // log the errorDi2015NewLine            Debug.Fail("Check the reason of fail:" + x.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return cLock;        Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void leaveLock()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _nmsWaitLock = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (mtx != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (cNeedToBeRelease)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                tryDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    mtx.ReleaseMutex();Di2015NewLine                    cNeedToBeRelease = false;    Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                catch (Exception x)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Debug.Fail("Check the reason of fail:" + x.ToString());Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            mtx.Close();Di2015NewLine            mtx.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            mtx = null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
15422634Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyClassDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MyClass()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void funct()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var gl = new MyNamedLock("lock name");Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Enter lockDi2015NewLine            if (gl.enterLockWithTimeout())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Do workDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine                throw new Exception("Failed to enter lock");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Leave lockDi2015NewLine            gl.leaveLock();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
